GSP33brssgo4u:8: tṛtīye adhyāye parā aparāsu vidyāsu sādhana āśrayo vicāraḥ prāyeṇātyagāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:11: prathamaṃ tāvat katibhiḥ cidadhikaraṇaiḥ sādhana āśrayavicāraśeṣameva anusarāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:12: 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.21)
GSP33brssgo4u:15: iti ca evamādiśravaṇeṣu saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ kartavya āhosvit āvṛttya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:16: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ syāt prayājādivat /
GSP33brssgo4u:19: nanu asakṛt upadeśā udāhṛtāḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti evamādayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:20: evam api yāvat śabdam āvartayet sakṛt śravaṇaṃ sakṛt mananaṃ sakṛt nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti na atiriktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:21: sakṛt upadeśeṣu tu veda upāsīta iti evamādiṣu anāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:24: 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' iti evañjātīyako hi asakṛt upadeśaḥ pratyayāvṛttiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:25: nanu uktaṃ yāvat śabdameva āvartayet na adhikam iti / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:27: darśanaparyavasānāni hi śravaṇādīni āvartyamānāni dṛṣṭārthāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:29: api ca upāsanaṃ nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti atyantarṇītāvṛttiguṇa eva kriyābhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:30: tathā hi - loke gurum upāste rājānam upāsta iti ca yaḥ tātparyeṇa gurvādīn anuvartate sa evam ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:31: tathā dhyāyati proṣitanāthā patim iti yā nirantara smaraṇā patiṃ prati sā utkaṇṭhā sā evam abhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:32: vidyupāstyoḥ ca vedānteṣu avyatirekeṇa prayogo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:33: kvacit vidinā upakramya upāsina upasaṃharati yathā - 'yastadveda yatsa veda sa mayaitaduktaḥ' (chā. 4.1.4)
GSP33brssgo4u:34: iti atra 'anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatāmupāḥse' (chā. 5.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:35: kvacit ca upāsina upakramya vidinā upasaṃharati yathā - 'mano brahmetyupāsīta' (chā. 3.18.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:36: iti atra 'bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.18.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:38: asakṛt upadeśaḥ tu āvṛtteḥ sūcakaḥ // 1 // oṃ /
GSP33brssgo4u:40: sādhanaṃ nirūpya phalaṃ nirūpyata ityadhyāyayorhatuphalabhāvaṃ saṃgatimāha-tṛtīya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:42: pūrvaṃ sākṣādeva śrutyuktaṃ saṃnyāsādi sādhanaṃ cintitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo4u:44: tadārabhya jīvanmuktistato dvitīyapāde utkrāntistṛtīye arcirādimārgasya gantavyasya ca nirṇayaścaturthe jñānopāsanayoḥ phalanirṇaya iti pādārthavivekaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:45: ādyādhikaraṇasya śravaṇādisādhanaṃ viṣayamanūdya dvedhānuṣṭhānadarśanātsaṃśayamāha-ātmā vā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:48: mokṣe viśeṣābhāvavacchravaṇādāvāvṛttiviśeṣo nāstīti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāvāntarasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:49: atra pūrva pakṣe śravaṇādeḥ prayājavadadṛṣṭārthatvātsakṛdanuṣṭhānaṃ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo4u:61: sa raikvo yadveda tatprāṇatattvaṃ raikvādanyo 'pi yaḥ kaścidveda tatphale sarvamantarbhavatītyetadukte itthaṃ mayotkṛṣṭatvena sa raikva ukta iti haṃsaṃ prati haṃsāntaravacanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo4u:73: iti raśmibahutva vijñānaṃ bahuputratāyai vidadhat siddhavat pratyayāvṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:75: atra āha - bhavatu nāma sādhyaphaleṣu pratyayeṣu āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:77: yaḥ tu parabrahmaviṣayaḥ pratyayo nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvameva ātmabhūtaṃ paraṃ brahma samarpayati tatra kim arthāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:78: sakṛt śrutau ca brahma ātmatvapratīti anupapatteḥ āvṛtti abhyupagama iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:81: iti evañjātīyakaṃ vākyaṃ sakṛt śrūyamāṇaṃ brahmātmatva pratītiṃ na utpādayet tataḥ tadeva āvartyamānam utpādayiṣyati iti kā pratyāśā syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:82: atha ucyeta na kevalaṃ vākyaṃ kañcidarthaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ śaknoti ato yuktyapekṣaṃ vākyam anubhāvayiṣyati brahmātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:84: sā api hi yuktiḥ sakṛt pravṛttaiva svam artham anubhāvayiṣyati /
GSP33brssgo4u:85: athāpi syāt uktyā vākyena ca sāmānyaviṣayameva vijñānaṃ kriyate na viśeṣaviṣayam /
GSP33brssgo4u:86: yathā asti me hṛdaye śūlam ityato vākyāt gātra kampādi liṅgāt ca śūlasadbhāva sāmānyameva paraḥ pratipadyate na viśeṣam anubhavati yathā sa eva śūlī /
GSP33brssgo4u:87: viśeṣa anubhavaḥ ca avidyāyā nivartakaḥ tataḥ tadartha āvṛttiḥ iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:88: asakṛt api tāvat mātre kriyamāṇe viśeṣavijñāna utpatti asaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:89: na hi sakṛt prayuktābhyāṃ śāstrayuktibhyām anavagato viśeṣaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ api prayujyamānābhyām avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:90: tasmāt yadi śāstrayuktibhyāṃ viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yadi vā sāmānyameva ubhayathā api sakṛt pravṛtte eva te svakāryaṃ kuruta iti āvṛtti anupayogaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:91: na ca sakṛt prayukte śāstrayuktī kasyacit api anubhavaṃ na utpādayata iti śakyate niyantuṃ vicitraprajñatvāt pratipattṛṇām /
GSP33brssgo4u:92: api ca aneka aṃśopete laukike padārthe sāmānya viśeṣavat ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam avadhārayati apareṇa aparam iti syāt api abhyāsa upayogo yathā dīrghaprapāṭhakagrahaṇādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:93: na tu nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi sāmānya viśeṣarahite caitanyamātrātmake pramā utpattau abhyāsāpekṣā yukta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:94: atra ucyate - bhavet āvṛtti ānarthakyaṃ taṃ prati yaḥ tattvamasi iti sakṛt uktameva brahmātmatvam anubhavituṃ śaknuyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:95: yastu na śaknoti taṃ pratyupayujyata eva āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:99: ādāśaṅkā kāraṇaṃ nirākṛtya tattvamasi iti eva asakṛt upadiśate /
GSP33brssgo4u:102: nanu uktaṃ sakṛt śrutaṃ cet tattvamasi vākyaṃ svam artham anubhāvayituṃ na śaknoti tata āvartyamānam api na eva śakṣyati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:105: dṛśyante hi sakṛt śrutāt vākyāt mandapratītaṃ vākyārtham āvartayantaḥ tat tat ābhāsavyudāsena samyak pratipadyamānāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:106: api ca tattvamasi iti etat vākyaṃ tvaṃ padārthasya tat padārthabhāvam ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo4u:107: tat padena ca prakṛtaṃ sat brahma īkṣitṛ jagato janmādikāraṇam abhidhīyate 'satyaṃ jñānamananta brahma' (tai. 2.1.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:117: anubhāvātmako brahmasaṃjñakaḥ tat padārtho vedānta abhiyuktānāṃ prasiddhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:118: tathā tvaṃpadārthaḥ api pratyagātmā śrotā dehāt ārabhya pratyagātmatayā saṃbhāvyamānaḥ caitanyaparyantatvena avadhāritaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:119: tatra yeṣām etau padārthau ajñāna saṃśaya viparyaya pratibaddhau teṣāṃ tatvamasi
GSP33brssgo4u:120: ityetat vākyaṃ svārthe pramāṃ na utpādayituṃ śaknoti padārthajñānapūrvakatvāt vākyārthasya
GSP33brssgo4u:122: yadyapi ca pratipattavya ātmā niraṃśaḥ tathā api adhyāropitaṃ tasmin bahu aśatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:123: deha indriya mano buddhi viṣaya vedanādi lakṣaṇaṃ tatra ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam
GSP33brssgo4u:124: apohati apareṇa aparam iti yujyate tatra kramavatī pratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:126: yeṣāṃ punaḥ nipuṇamatīnāṃ na ajñānasaṃśayaviparyayalakṣaṇaḥ padārthaviṣayaḥ pratibandhaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:127: asti te śaknuvanti sakṛt uktameva tattvamasi vākyārtham anubhavitum iti tān pratyāvṛtti
GSP33brssgo4u:129: sakṛt utpanna eva hi ātmapratipattiḥ avidyāṃ nivartayati iti na atra kaścit api kramaḥ abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:130: satyamevaṃ yujyeta yadi kasyacit evaṃ pratipattiḥ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo4u:132: ato na duḥkhitvādi abhāvaṃ kaścit pratipadyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:133: dehādi abhimānavat duḥkhitvādi abhimānasya mithyā abhimānatva upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:134: pratyakṣaṃ hi dehe chidyamāne dahyamāne vā ahaṃ chidye dahya iti ca mithyā abhimāno dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:135: tathā bāhyatareṣu api putramitrādiṣu saṃtapyamāneṣu ahameva saṃtapya ityadi āropo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:137: dehādivat eva caitanyāt bahiḥ upalabhamānatvāt duḥkhitvādīnāṃ suṣuptādiṣu ca ananuvṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:138: caitanyasya tu suṣupte api anuvṛttim āmananti 'yadvai tanna paśyati paśyanvai tanna paśyati' (bṛ. 4.3.23) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:139: tasmāt sarvaduḥkhavinirmukta ekacaitanyātmakaḥ aham ityeṣa ātmānubhavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:140: na ca evam ātmānam anubhavataḥ kiñcit anyat kṛtyam avaśiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:141: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssgo4u:144: ātmanyeva ca saṃtuṣṭasya kāryaṃ na vidyate' (gī. 3.17) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:145: yasya tu na eṣaḥ anubhavo drāgiva jāyate taṃ pratyanubhavārtha eva āvṛtti abhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:146: tatra api na tattvamasi vākyārthāt pracyāvyāvṛttau pravartayet /
GSP33brssgo4u:148: niyuktasya ca asmin adhikṛtaḥ ahaṃ kartā mayā idaṃ mandam apratibhānāt taṃ brahmapratyayāt viparītapratyaya utpadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:149: yaḥ tu svayameva mandamatiḥ apratibhānāt taṃ vākyārthaṃ jihāset tasya etasmin eva vākyārthe sthirīkāra āvṛttyādi vāco yuktyā abhyupeyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:150: tasmāt parabrahmaviṣaye api pratyaye tat upāya upadeśeṣu āvṛttisiddhiḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssgo4u:151: ādityasyaikasyaivodgīthe saṃpādyopāsanānmama tvameka eva putro 'sīti kauṣītakiḥ putramuvāca,
GSP33brssgo4u:152: atastvaṃ tathā mākṛthāḥ kintu bahūn raśmīnādityaṃ ca paryāvartayatāt pṛthagāvartayasvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:161: tayoḥ parokṣajñānahetutvasvābhāvyādāvṛttāvapi na sākṣātkāraḥ syāditi pariharati-nāsakṛdapīti /
GSP33brssgo4u:167: dvitīyasya tu pratibandhanirāsāya tadapekṣeti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:169: yathā ṣaḍjādisvarabhedasākṣātkāraśaktamapi śrotramabhyāsamapekṣate tathā brahmātmasākṣātkāraśaktaṃ vākyaṃ tadapekṣamityanubhavamāśrityāha-nahi dṛṣṭe 'nupapannaṃ nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo4u:173: āropitāṃśanirāsāya na me deho nendriyamityabhyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:183: nirduḥkhe cidātmani duḥkhādidhiyo bhrāntitvādvākyārthānubhavo na virudhyata ityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:184: anubhave jāte 'pyāvṛttyādyanuṣṭhānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-na caivamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:185: ratiḥ kāmaḥ ātmakāmatayā tṛptirviṣayatṛṣṇākṣayaḥ tena saṃtoṣe ātmānandānubhava iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:186: nanvāvṛttau niyogātpravṛttirvācyā tathā ca niyuktatvabuddherakartrātmadhīrna syādityata āha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brssgo4u:195: yaḥ śāstroktaviśeṣaṇa paramātmā sa kim aham iti grahītavyaḥ kiṃvā mat anya iti etat vicārayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:196: kathaṃ punaḥ ātmaśabde pratyagātmaviṣaye śrūyamāṇe saṃśaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:197: ucyate - ayam ātmaśabdo mukhyaḥ śakyate abhyupagantuṃ sati jīva īśvarayoḥ abhedasaṃbhava itarathā tu gauṇaḥ ayam abhyupagantavya iti manyate
GSP33brssgo4u:198: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ na aham iti grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:199: na hi apahatapāpmatvādi guṇo viparīta guṇatvena śakyate grahītuṃ viparīta guṇo ca apahatapāpmatvādi guṇatvena /
GSP33brssgo4u:200: apahatapāpmatvādi guṇaḥ ca parameśvaraḥ tadviparītaguṇaḥ tu śārīraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:201: īśvarasya ca saṃsāri ātmatva īśvara abhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:203: saṃsāriṇaḥ api īśvara ātmatve adhikāri abhāvāt śāstra ānarthakyameva,
GSP33brssgo4u:205: anyatve api tādātmya darśanaṃ śāstrāt kartavyaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādidarśanam iti cet kāmamevaṃ bhavatu /
GSP33brssgo4u:206: na tu saṃsāriṇo mukhya ātma īśvara ityetat naḥ prāpayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:207: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātma ityeva parameśvaraḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:208: tathā hi parameśvara prakriyāyāṃ jābālā ātmatvena eva etam upagacchanti - 'tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devato 'haṃ vai tvamasi bhagavo deveti' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:209: tathā anye api 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityevam ādaya ātmatva upagamā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:210: grāhayanti ca ātmatvena eva īśvaraṃ vedāntavākyāni 'eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:214: yat uktaṃ pratīka darśanam idaṃ viṣṇupratimā nyāyena bhaviṣyati iti tat ayuktaṃ gauṇatva prasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:216: yatra hi pratīkadṛṣṭiḥ abhipreyate sakṛdeva tatra vacanaṃ bhavati yathā - 'mano brahma' (chā. 3.18.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:218: iha punaḥ tvam aham asmi ahaṃ ca tvam asi iti āha,
GSP33brssgo4u:221: tathā hi - 'atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste 'nyo 'sāvanyo 'hamīti na sa veda' (bṛ. 1.4.10)
GSP33brssgo4u:222: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.5.7)
GSP33brssgo4u:223: iti evamādyā bhūyasī śrutiḥ bhedadarśanam apavadati /
GSP33brssgo4u:224: yat tu uktaṃ na viruddhaguṇayoḥ anyonya ātmasaṃbhava iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:230: na hi īśvarasya saṃsāri ātmatvaṃ pratipādyata iti abhyupagacchāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsāritva apohena īśvarātmatvaṃ pratipipāyiṣitam iti
GSP33brssgo4u:231: evaṃ ca sati advaita īśvarasya apahatapāpmatvādiguṇatā viparītaguṇatā tu itarasya mithyā iti vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:232: yat api uktam adhikāri abhāvaḥ pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ ca iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:237: ityādinā hi prabodhe pratyakṣādi abhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:238: pratyakṣādi abhāve śruteḥ api abhāvaprasaṅga iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:242: iti vacanāt iṣyata eva asmābhiḥ śruteḥ api abhāvaḥ prabodhe /
GSP33brssgo4u:243: kasya punaḥ ayam aprabodha iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:244: ya- tvaṃ pṛcchasi tasya ta iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:245: nanu aham īśvara eva uktaḥ śrutyā,
GSP33brssgo4u:246: yadi evaṃ pratibuddhaḥ asi na asti kasyacit aprabodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:247: yaḥ api doṣaḥ codyate kaiścit avidyā kila ātmanaḥ sadvitīyatvāt advaita anupapattiḥ iti saḥ api etena pratyuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:248: tasmāt ātma iti eva īśvare mano dadhīta // 3 //
GSP33brssgo4u:250: pūrvatra dhyānāderāvṛttiruktā tāmupajīvya tattvajñānārthaṃ dhyānāvṛttikāle kimahaṃ brahmeti dhyātavyamuta matsvāmīśvara ityaikyabhedamānābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-ya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:256: kiñca kimīśvarasya jīvamātratvamaikyaṃ jīvasyeśvaramātratvaṃ veti vikalpya krameṇa dūṣayati-īśvarasya cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:262: īśvarasya jīvatvaṃ na pratipādyaṃ yeneśvarābhāvaḥ syātkintu jīvasyeśvaratvam /
GSP33brssgo4u:267: vādināṃ satyatvāgrahastvavidyāvijṛmbhita iti vedasatyatvābhāvo na doṣa ityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo4u:278: na pratīke na hi saḥ / BBs_4,1.4 /
GSP33brssgo4u:282: iti evamādiṣu pratīka upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ teṣu api ātmagrahaḥ kartavyo na vā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:286: brahmaṇaḥ śrutiṣu ātmatvena prasiddhatvāt pratīkānām api brahmavikāratvāt brahmatve satyām ātmatva upapatteḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:287: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na pratīkeṣu ātma matiṃ badhnīyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:288: na hi sa upāsakaḥ pratīkāni vyastāni ātmatvenākalayet /
GSP33brssgo4u:289: yat punaḥ brahmavikāratvāt pratīkānāṃ brahmatvaṃ tataḥ ca ātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:292: vikārasvarūpa upamardena hi nāmādi jātasya brahmatvameva āśrite bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:293: svarūpa upamarde ca nāmādīnāṃ kutaḥ pratīkatvam ātmagraho vā /
GSP33brssgo4u:294: na ca brahmaṇa ātmatvāt brahmadṛṣṭi upadeśeṣu ātmadṛṣṭiḥ kalpyā /
GSP33brssgo4u:296: kartṛtvādi saṃvarga saṃsāra dharmanirākaraṇe hi brahmaṇa ātmatva upadeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:298: ataḥ ca upāsakasya pratīkaiḥ samatvāt ātmagraho na upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:299: na hi rūcaka svastikayoḥ itaretara ātmatvam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:300: suvarṇa ātmatvena iva tu brahma ātmatvena ekatve pratīka abhāvaprasaṅgam avocāma /
GSP33brssgo4u:304: yathā brahmaṇyabhedasattavādahaṅgraha ukta evaṃ pratīkeṣvapi brahmavikāratayā jīvābhinnabrahmābhinnatvājjīvābhedasattvenāhaṅgrahaḥ kārya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:313: vikārasya brahmaṇā svarūpaikyāyogādbādhenaikyaṃ vācyaṃ pratīkabādhe copāstividhirna syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:315: tathāca bādhamūlabrahmaikyajñānaṃ dvārīkṛtya pratīkeṣvahaṅgrahopāstikalpanā na yuktā,
GSP33brssgo4u:317: ato jīvapratīkayoḥ svarūpabhedādahaṅgrahe vidhyaśravaṇācca nāhaṅgraha iti phalitamāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brssgo4u:318: yathā rucakasvastikayoḥ suvarṇātmanaikye 'pi mitho naikyaṃ tathā jīvapratīkayoḥ brahmātmanaikye 'pi bhedaḥ samaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:319: yadica dharmivyatirekeṇa tayorabhāvaniścayādvastvaikyaṃ tadopāsanoccheda ukta ityarthaḥ //4//
GSP33brssgo4u:324: teṣu eva udāharaṇeṣu anyaḥ saṃśayaḥ - kim ādityādi dṛṣṭayo brahmaṇi adhyasitavyāḥ kiṃvā brahmadṛṣṭiḥ ādityādiṣu iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:326: atra hi brahmaśabdasya ādityādiśabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:327: ādityo brahma prāṇo brahma vidyut brahma ityādi samāna vibhakti nirdeśāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:328: na ca atra āñjasaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:330: na hi bhavati gauḥ aśva iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:331: nanu prakṛtivikārabhāvāt brahma ādityānāṃ mṛt śarāvādivat sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:335: paramātma vākyaṃ ca idaṃ tadānīṃ syāt tataḥ ca upāsana adhikāro bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:337: tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ agniḥ vaiśvānara ityādivat anyatra anyadṛṣṭi adhyāse sati kva kindṛṣṭiḥ adhyasyatām iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:338: tatra aniyamo niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt ityevaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:339: athavā ādityādi dṛṣṭaya eva brahmaṇi kartavyā iti evaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:340: evaṃ hi ādityādi dṛṣṭibhiḥ brahma upāsitaṃ bhavati brahma upāsanaṃ ca phalavat iti śāstramaryādā /
GSP33brssgo4u:342: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - brahmadṛṣṭiḥ eva ādityādiṣu syāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:347: tathā ca laukiko nyāyo anugato bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:348: utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ hi nikṛṣṭe adhyasitavya iti laukiko nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:352: na hi kṣattṛdṛṣṭiparigṛhīto rājā nikarṣaṃ nīyamānaḥ śreyase syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:353: nanu śāstraprāmāṇyāt anāśaṅkanīyaḥ atra pratyavāya prasaṅgo na ca lokikena nyāyena śāstrīyā dṛṣṭiḥ niyantuṃ yukta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:354: atra ucyate - nirdhārite śāstrārtha etat evaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:355: saṃdigdhe tu tasmin nirṇayaṃ prati lokikaḥ api nyāya āśrīyanāṇo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:356: tena ca utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭi adhyāse śāstrārthe avadhāryamāṇe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭim adhyasyan pratyaveyāt iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:357: prāthamyāt ca ādityādi śabdānāṃ mukhyārthatvam avirodhāt gṛhītavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:358: taiḥ svārthavṛttibhiḥ avaruddhāyāṃ buddhau paścāt avatarato brahmaśabdasya mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃbhavāt brahmadṛṣṭividhānārthata eva avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:359: itiparatvāt api brahmaśabdasya eṣa eva artho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:360: tathā hi 'brahmetyādeśaḥ' 'brahmetyupāsīta' 'brahametyupāste' iti ca sarvatra itiparaṃ brahmaśabdam uccārayati śuddhān tu ādityādi śabdān /
GSP33brssgo4u:361: tata- ca yathā śuktikāṃ rajatam iti pratyeti ityatra śuktivacana eva śuktikā śabdo rajataśabdaḥ tu rajatapratīti lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:362: pratyetyeva hi kevalaṃ rajatam iti na tu tatra rajatam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:363: evam atra api ādityādīn brahma iti pratīyāt iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:364: vākyaśeṣaḥ api ca dvitīyānirdeśena ādityādīneva upāstikriyayā vyāpyamānān darśayati - 'sa ya etamevaṃ vidvānādityaṃ brahmetyupāste' (chā. 3.19.4)
GSP33brssgo4u:367: yat tu uktaṃ brahma upāsanām eva atra ādaraṇīyaṃ phalatvāya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:369: uktena nyāyena ādityādīnām eva upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:370: phalaṃ tu atithyādi upāsana iva ādityādi upāsane 'pi brahma eva dāsyati sarva adhyakṣatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:371: varṇitaṃ ca etat 'phalamata upapatteḥ' (bra.sū. 3.2.38) iti atra /
GSP33brssgo4u:372: īdṛśaṃ ca atra brahmaṇa upāsyatvaṃ yat pratīkeṣu tat dṛṣṭi adhyāropaṇaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām // 5 //
GSP33brssgo4u:384: ataḥ pariśeṣādadhyāsa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyakāraṇam adhyāse ca niyāmakābhāvātsaṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:387: siddhānte tu vikāradṛṣṭyā brahmaṇa upāsyatve nikarṣaprāptau satyāṃ phalavattvāsiddhervikārā evotkṛṣṭabrahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā iti phalam /
GSP33brssgo4u:388: kiñca laukikanyāyāviruddhārthasaṃbhave viruddhārtho na grāhyaḥ pratyavāyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:391: tathā cādityādayo brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā ityeva vākyārtha ityāha-prāthamyācceti /
GSP33brssgo4u:393: itiśabdaśiraskaḥ śabdaḥ samabhivyāhṛtakriyālakṣaka iti loke prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:399: kiñca yaddṛṣṭyā vikārasyotkarṣaḥ tasya brahmaṇo viśeṣaṇatve 'pyupāsyatvaṃ cātītyāha-īdṛśaṃ ceti //5//
GSP33brssgo4u:408: iti evamādiṣu aṅgāvabaddheṣu upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ kim ādityādiṣu udgīthādi dṛṣṭayo vidhīyante kiṃ vā udgīthādiṣu eva ādityādi dṛṣṭaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:409: tatra aniyamo niyamakāraṇa abhāvāt iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:410: na hi atra brahmaṇa iva kasyacit utkarṣaviśeṣaḥ avadhāryate 'brahma hi samasta jagat
GSP33brssgo4u:411: kāraṇatvāt apahatapāpmatvādi guṇayogāt ca ādityādibhya utkṛṣṭam iti śakyam avadhārayituṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:412: na tu āditya udgīthādīnāṃ vikāratva aviśeṣāt kañcit utkarṣaviśeṣa avadhāraṇe kāraṇam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:416: udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakāḥ santaḥ phalahetavo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:419: iti ṛkśabdena pṛthivīṃ nirdiśati sāmaśabdena agniṃ tat ca pṛthivi agnyoḥ rṛk sāmadṛṣṭicīkīrṣāyām avakalpate na ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivi agnidṛṣṭi cikīrṣāyām /
GSP33brssgo4u:420: kṣattari hi rājadṛṣṭikaraṇāt rājaśabda upacaryate na rājani kṣattṛśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:422: iti adhikaraṇanirdeśāt lokeṣu sāma adhyasitavyam iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:425: prathamanirdiṣṭeṣu ca ādityādiṣu caramanirdiṣṭaṃ brahma adhyastam 'ādityo brahmetyādeśaḥ' (chā. 3.19.1) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:426: prathamanirdiṣṭāḥ ca pṛthivyādayaḥ caramanardiṣṭā hiṅkārādayaḥ 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:429: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ādityādimataya eva aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran /
GSP33brssgo4u:431: upapadyate hi evam apūrvasaṃnikarṣāt ādityādimatibhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇeṣu udgīthādiṣu karmasamṛddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:432: 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssgo4u:435: svatantraphaleṣu tu katham 'ya etadevaṃ vidvāṃllokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.2.3) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:436: teṣu api adhikṛta adhikārāt prakṛta apūrvasaṃnikarṣeṇa eva phalakalpanā yuktā godohanādīniyamavat /
GSP33brssgo4u:437: phalātmakatvāt ca ādityādīnām udgīthādibhyaḥ karmātmakebhya utkarṣa upapattiḥ ādityādiprāptilakṣaṇaṃ hi karmaphalaṃ śiṣyate śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:440: iti ca udgīthameva upāsyatvena upakramya ādityādimatīḥ vidadhāti /
GSP33brssgo4u:441: yat tu uktam udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmabhūyaṃ bhūtvā phalaṃ kariṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:444: ādityādibhāvena api ca dṛśyamānānām udgīthādīnāṃ karmātmakatvān apāyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:446: iti tu lākṣaṇika eva pṛthivī agnyoḥ ṛk sāmaśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:447: lakṣaṇā ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭena viprakṛṣṭena vā svārthasaṃbandhena pravartate /
GSP33brssgo4u:448: tatra yadi api ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivī agnyoḥ ca saṃnidhānayoreva eṣa ṛk sāmaśabdaprayoga ṛk sāmasaṃbandhāt iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:449: kṣattṛśabdaḥapi hi kutaścit kāraṇāt rājānam upasarpan na nivārayituṃ pāryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:451: iti ca yathā akṣaranyāsam ṛca eva pṛthivītvam avadhārayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:452: pṛthivyā hi aktve avadhāryamāṇa iyam ṛk eva ityakṣaranyāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:454: iti ca aṅgāśrayameva vijñānam upasaṃharati na pṛthivyādi āśrayam /
GSP33brssgo4u:456: iti yadi api saptamīnirdiṣṭā lokāḥ tathāpi sāmnyeva te adhyasyeran dvitīyānirdeśena sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:457: sāmani hi lokeṣu adhyasyamāneṣu sāma lokātmana upāsitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:458: anyathā punaḥ lokāḥ sāmā ātmana upāsitāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:461: yatra api tulyo dvitīyanirdeśaḥ - 'atha khalvamumādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.9.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:462: iti, tatra api 'samastasya khalu sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhu' (chā. 2.8.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:465: iti ca sāmna eva upāsyatva upakramāt tasmin eva ādityādi adhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:466: etasmāt eva ca sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:467: ityādinirdeśaviparyaye api hiṅkārādiṣu eva pṛthivyādi dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:468: tasmāt anaṅgāśrayā ādityādimatayaḥ aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran iti siddham // 6 //
GSP33brssgo4u:472: tairevādiriti upadrava iti ca bhaktidvayādhikaiḥ saptāṃśa sāmeti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:475: siddharūpādityādibhyaḥ karmarūpodgīthādīnāṃ phalasaṃnikarṣeṇotkarṣādbrahmavadviśeṣaṇatve niyama iti dṛṣṭāntena mukhyaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-athaveti
GSP33brssgo4u:481: tatra yadi ṛksāmātmakayoḥ karmāṅgayoḥ pṛthivyagnidṛṣṭhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo4u:491: nanu yatropāstīnāṃ prakṛtakarmāpūrvasaṃnikṛṣṭāṅgadvārāpekṣaṃ phalaṃ śrutaṃ tatra
GSP33brssgo4u:494: yathā svatantrapaśuphalasyāpi godohanasya aṅgadvārāpekṣayaiva phalamiṣṭaṃ tadvallokādiphaleṣūpāsaneṣvapi karmāpūrvāṅgadvāraiva phalakalpanā
GSP33brssgo4u:502: siddhādityādyātmanā karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭau karmatvahāniḥ syādityata āha-ādityādibhāveneti /
GSP33brssgo4u:508: tathā cātra ṛksāmayoḥ pṛthivyāgnidṛṣṭipakṣe 'pi ṛksāmapadābhyāṃ svavācyārthe draṣṭavyatākhyaparamparāsaṃbandhena pṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā yuktetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:509: nanu pratīkavācipadasya dhyeye arthe lakṣaṇā na yuktā,
GSP33brssgo4u:511: tathāpi ṛksāmasaṃbandhātpṛthivyagnyorevaitasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāmeti mukhyayoḥ pṛthaguktestadetasyāmityatrāpi tayorgrahe punaruktiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo4u:512: ataḥ pratīkābhedadṛṣṭyā pṛthivyagnyoḥ pratīkasaṃnidhānāttayoreva pratīkapadaprayogaḥ kṛtastabhedadārḍhyāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:514: sthitaprayogasya nimittaṃ kimapi vācyaṃ na tu nimittamastīti prayoga āpādya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:516: tasya kāryaṃ rathacaryādi yadā rājeva karoti tadā kṣattṛśabdo rājanyapyastītyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:519: sāmātmanā lokānupāsīteti dvitīyāsaptamyorbhaṅgastvayā kāryastato varaṃ lokātmanā sāmopāsīteti saptamīmātrabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:520: eteneti ekavibhaktibhaṅgalāghavena prāṇātmanā gāyatraṃ sāmopāsyamiti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:522: 'sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhu'ityupakramya pṛthivī hiṅgāra ityādinā hiṅgārādipañcāvayavasya sāmna upāsanamuktvā 'iti tu pañcavidhasyopāsanam'ityupasaṃhṛtya,
GSP33brssgo4u:523: atheti saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanaṃ prakramya prapañcitamataḥ sāmna evopāsyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:526: yadyapi hiṅkāroddeśena pṛthivītvavidheruddeśyasya prathamanirdeśo vācyastathāpyuktanyāyabalādvyatyayo grāhya ityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo4u:531: karmāṅgasaṃbaddheṣu tāvat upāsaneṣu karmatantratvāt na āsanādicintā na api samyak darśane vastutantratvāt vijñānasya /
GSP33brssgo4u:532: itareṣu tu upāsaneṣu kim aniyamena tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayāno vā pravarteta uta niyamena āsīna eva iti cintayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:533: tatra mānasatvāt upāsanasya aniyamaḥ śarīrasthiteḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:534: evaṃ prāpte bravīti - āsīna eva upāsīta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:536: upāsanaṃ nāma samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇaṃ na ca tat gacchato dhāvato vā saṃbhavati gatyādīnāṃ cittavikṣepakatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:537: tiṣṭhataḥ api dehadhāraṇe vyāpṛtaṃ mano na sūkṣmavastunirīkṣaṇakṣamaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:538: śayānasya api akasmāt eva nidrayā abhibhūyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:539: āsīnasya tu evañjātīyako bhūyān doṣaḥ suparihara iti saṃbhavati tasya upāsanam // 7 //
GSP33brssgo4u:544: siddhānte tu manodehayorbhinnatve 'pi dehacāñcalye manaso 'navasthānasya anubhavasiddhatvānmanovyāpāreṣūpāsaneṣu dehasthairyārthamāsananiyamāpekṣeti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:549: api ca dhyāyati arthaṃ eṣa yat samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇam /
GSP33brssgo4u:550: dhyāyatiḥ ca praśithila aṅgaceṣṭeṣu pratiṣṭhitadṛṣṭiṣu ekaviṣaya ākṣiptacitteṣu upacaryamāṇo dṛśyate dhyāyati bako dhyāyati proṣitabandhuḥ iti
GSP33brssgo4u:558: iti atra pṛthivyādiṣu acalatvameva apekṣya dhyāyativādo bhavati tat ca liṅgam upāsanasya āsīnakarmatve // 9 //
GSP33brssgo4u:563: smaranti api ca śiṣṭā upāsana aṅgatvena āsanam - 'śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiramāsanamātmanaḥ' (gī. 6.11) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:564: ata eva padmakādīnām āsanaviśeṣāṇām upadeśo yogaśāstre // 10 //
GSP33brssgo4u:565: brahmasya śārīrasya cāsanasya smaraṇānniyama ityāha-smaranti ceti //10//
GSP33brssgo4u:570: dik deśakāleṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim asti kaścit niyamo na asti vā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:571: prāyeṇa vaidikeṣu ārambheṣu digādiniyamadarśanāt syāt iha api kaścit niyama iti yasya matiḥ taṃ prati āha dik deśakāleṣu arthalakṣaṇa eva niyamaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:572: yatra eva asya diśi deśe kāle vā manasaḥ sokaryeṇa ekāgratā bhavati tatra eva upāsīta prācīdik pūrvāhna prācīna pravaṇādivat viśeṣa aśrāvaṇāt
GSP33brssgo4u:574: nanu viśeṣam api kecit āmananti - 'same śucau kharkarāvahnivālukāvivarjite śabdajalāśrayādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:578: sati tu etasmin tadgateṣu viśeṣaniyama iti suhṛt bhūtvā ācārya ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo4u:579: 'manonukūle' iti ca eṣā śrutiḥ yatra ekāgratā tatra eva iti etat eva darśayati // 11 //
GSP33brssgo4u:581: teṣvevāṅgānāśritopāsaneṣu prācyādidiśi tīrthādideśe pradoṣādikāle niyamo 'sti na vetyubhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:582: ekaviṣayatvaṃ saṃgatirūpāstīnāṃ vihitatvādyāgādivadasti digādiniyama iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:587: prācīnapravaṇe prāgdeśe nimnasthāne vaiśvadevaṃ kuryāditivadatra digādiviśeṣo na śrūyate ato 'numānamaprayojakamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:592: vācanikaṃ samadeśādiniyamamaṅgīkṛtya cittaikāgryaviruddheṣu deśādigateṣu prācīnapravaṇatvādiṣvanādara iti suhṛdbhāvena sūtrakṛdupadiśati /
GSP33brssgo4u:597: ā prayāṇāt tatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam / BBs_4,1.12 /
GSP33brssgo4u:598: āvṛttiḥ sarva upāsaneṣu ādartavya iti sthitam ādye adhikaraṇe /
GSP33brssgo4u:599: tatra yāni tāvat samyak darśanārthāni upāsanāni tāni avaghātādivat kāryaparyavasānāni iti jñātameva eṣām āvṛttiparimāṇam /
GSP33brssgo4u:600: na hi samyak darśane kārye niṣpanne yatnāntaraṃ kiñcit śāsituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:602: yāni punaḥ abhyudayaphalāni teṣu eṣā cintā kiṃ kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam āvartya uparamet uta yāvajjīvam āvartayet iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:604: kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam abhyasya utsṛjet āvṛttiviśiṣṭasya upāsanaśabdārthasya kṛtatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:605: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - āprāyaṇāt eva āvartayet pratyayam /
GSP33brssgo4u:607: karmāṇi api hi janmāntara upabhogyaṃ phalam ārabhamāṇāni tat anurūpaṃ bhāvanāvijñānaṃ prāyaṇakāla ākṣipanti,
GSP33brssgo4u:609: prāṇastejasā yuktaḥ sahātmanā yathāsaṃkalpitaṃ lokaṃ nayati' iti ca evamādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:611: pratyayāḥ tu ete svarūpa anuvṛttiṃ muktvā kim anyat prāyaṇakālabhāvi bhāvanāvijñānam apekṣeran /
GSP33brssgo4u:612: tasmāt ye pratipattavyaphalabhāvanātmakāḥ pratyayaḥ teṣu aprāyaṇāt āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:613: tathā ca śrutiḥ -'sa yāvatkraturayamasmāllokātpraiti' iti prāyaṇakāle api pratyaya anuvṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:614: smṛtiḥ api - 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssgo4u:617: 'so 'ntavelāyāmetattrayaṃ pratipadyeta' iti ca maraṇavelāyām api kartavyaśeṣaṃ śrāvayati // 12 //
GSP33brssgo4u:624: upāstīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ cāntyakāle prāptavyaphalasphūrtidvārā phalahetutve mānamāha-savijñāna iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:625: bhāvanāmayaṃ vijñānaṃ phalasphuraṇaṃ tena sahitaḥ savijñāno vijñānasphuritaphalaṃ vijñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:626: yasmiṃlloke cittaṃ saṃkalpo 'syeti yaccittastena saṃkalpitena lokena saha phalasphūrtyanantaraṃ manaḥ prāṇe līyate iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo4u:630: astvidamantyaphalaṃ vijñānaṃ karmaṇamivādṛṣṭadvāropāstīnāṃ tataḥ kuta āmaraṇamāvṛttirityata āha-pratyayāstviti /
GSP33brssgo4u:643: atha idānīṃ brahmavidyāphalaṃ prati cintā pratāyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:644: brahma adhigame sati tat viparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyate vā iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:646: phalārthatvāt karmaṇaḥ phalam adatvā na saṃbhāvyate kṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:647: phaladāyinī hi asya śaktiḥ śrutyā samadhigatā /
GSP33brssgo4u:648: yadi tadantareṇa eva phala upabhogam apavṛjyeta śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:650: nanu evaṃ sati prāyaścitta upadeśaḥanarthakaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo4u:653: api ca prāyaścittānāṃ doṣasaṃyogena vidānāt bhavet api doṣakṣapaṇārthatā na tu evaṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ vidhānam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:654: nanu anabhyupagamyamāne brahmavidaḥ karmakṣaye tatphalasya avaśyaṃ bhoktavyatāvāt anirmokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:657: tasmāt na brahma adhigame duritanivṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:658: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- tat adhigame brahma adhigame sati uttarapūrvayoḥ aghayoḥ aśleṣavināśau bhavataḥ uttarasya aśleṣaḥ pūrvasya vināśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:661: tathā hi brahmavidyā prakriyāyāṃ saṃbhāvyamānasaṃbandhasya āgāmino duritasya anabhisaṃbandhaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:662: viduṣo vyapadiśati - 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma
GSP33brssgo4u:664: tathā vināśam api pūrva ucitasya duritasya vyapadiśati - 'tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante' (chā. 5.24.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:665: ayam aparaḥ karmakṣayavyapadeśo bhavati - 'bhidyate hṛdayagranthiśchidyante sarvasaṃśayāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:666: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:667: yat uktam anupabhuktaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayakalpanāyāṃ śāstraṃ kadarthitaṃ syāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:669: na hi vayaṃ karmaṇaḥ phaladāyinīṃ śaktim avajānīmahe,
GSP33brssgo4u:671: sā tu vidyādinā kāraṇāntareṇa pratibadhyata iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:672: śaktisadbhāvamātre ca śāstraṃ vyāpriyate na pratibandha apratibandhayoḥ api /
GSP33brssgo4u:673: na hi karma kṣīyata iti etat api smaraṇam autsargikaṃ na bhogāt ṛte karma kṣīyata tadarthatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:674: iṣyata eva tu prāyaścittādinā tasya kṣayaḥ 'sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati' 'tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainameva vada' ityādi śrutismṛtibhyaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:675: yat tu uktaṃ naimittikāni prāyaścittāni bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:677: doṣasaṃyogena codyamānānām eṣāṃ doṣanirghātaphalasaṃbhave phalāntarakalpanā anupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:678: yatpunaḥ etat uktaṃ na prāyaścittavat doṣakṣaya uddeśena vidyāvidānam asti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:679: atra brūmaḥ - saguṇāsu tāvat vidyāsu vidyata eva vidhānam /
GSP33brssgo4u:680: tāsu ca vākyaśeṣa aiśvaryaprāptiḥ pāpanivṛttiḥ ca vidyāvata ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:681: tayoḥ ca avivakṣākāraṇaṃ na asti iti ataḥ pāpmaprahāṇapūrvaka aiśvaryaprāptiḥ tāsāṃ phalam iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:682: nirguṇāyāṃ tu vidyāyāṃ yadi api vidhānaṃ na asti tathā api akartṛ ātmatvabodhāt karmapradāhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:683: aśleṣa iti ca āgāmiṣu karmasu kartṛtvameva na pratipadyate brahmavit iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:684: atikrānteṣu tu yadi api mithyājñānāt kartṛtvaṃ pratipeda iva tathā api vidyāsāmarthyāt mithyājñānanivṛtteḥ tāni api pravilīyanta iti āha vināśa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:685: pūrvasiddhakartṛtva bhoktṛtva viparītaṃ hi triṣu api kāleṣu akartṛtva abhoktṛtvasvarūpaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:686: brahma aham asmi na itaḥ pūrvam api kartā bhoktā vā aham āsaṃ na idānīṃ na api bhaviṣyatkāla
GSP33brssgo4u:689: anyathā hi anādikālapravṛttānāṃ karmāṇāṃ kṣayābhāve mokṣa abhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:690: na ca deśakālanimittāpekṣo mokṣaḥ karmaphalavat bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:693: tasmāt brahma adhigame duritakṣaya iti sthiram // 13 //
GSP33brssgo4u:694: yathopāsakānāṃ yāvajjīvaṃ kartavyamasti na tathātmavidāmiti karmakṣayalakṣaṇāṃ jīvanmuktimāha-tadadhigama iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:696: saṃprati phalādhyāyasthā phalacintā kriyata ityāha-gata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:702: ataḥ phalāntameva pāpaṃ na madhye naśyatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:703: nanu tarhi tannāśārthaṃ prāyaścittavidhirna syāditi cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:704: yathā āhitāgnergṛhadāhe nimitte sati 'agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet'iti iṣṭividhistadvaddoṣe nimittamātre sati prāyaścittavidherdeṣanāśārthatvāsiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:707: kuryādityatra tu malinaḥ snāyāditivaddoṣapadasya nivṛttidvārā phalaparatvasaṃbhavāt
GSP33brssgo4u:711: karmabhogānantaraṃ deśakālāntare mokṣo bhaviṣyati śāstraprāmāṇyādityāha-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:717: smṛtiśca karmaṇaḥ phalaśaktau pramāṇamataḥ śaktasyāpi kutaścinnāśāṅgīkāreṇa śāstravirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:729: itarasyāpy evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu / BBs_4,1.14 /
GSP33brssgo4u:730: pūrvasmin adhikaraṇe bandhahetoḥ aghasya svābhāvikasya aśleṣavināśau jñānanimittau śāstravyapadeśāt nirūpitau /
GSP33brssgo4u:731: dharmasya punaḥ śāstrīyatvāt śāstrīyeṇa jñānena avirodha iti āśaṅkya tat nirākaraṇāya pūrva adhikaraṇanyāya atideśaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:732: itarasya api puṇyasya karmaṇa evam aghavat asaṃśleṣo vināśaḥ ca jñānavato bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:735: ityādiśrutiṣu ca duṣkṛtavat sukṛtasya api praṇāśavyapadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:736: akartṛ ātmatvabodhanimittasya ca karmakṣayasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ tulyatvāt 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi' (mu. 2.2.8)
GSP33brssgo4u:738: yatra api kevala eva pāpmaśabdo dṛśyate tatra api tena eva puṇyam api akalitam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:740: asti ca śrutau puṇye api pāpmaśabdaḥ 'nainaṃ setumahorātre tarataḥ' (chā. 8.4.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:741: iti atra saha duṣkṛtena sakṛtamapi anukramya sarve pāpmānaḥ ato nivartanta iti aviśeṣeṇa eva prakṛte puṇye pāpmaśabdaprayogāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:742: pāte tu iti tu śabdaḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:743: evaṃ dharma adharmayoḥ bandhahetvoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt aśleṣavināśasiddheḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī viduṣaḥ śarīrapāte muktiḥ iti avadhārayati // 14//
GSP33brssgo4u:746: jñānātpuṇyaṃ kṣīyate na veti pūrvavatsaṃdehe jñānaṃ tu na puṇyanāśakaṃ śāstrīyatvātpuṇyavadityadhikāśaṅkāmuktvātideśaṃ vyācaṣṭe-dharmasyetyādinā
GSP33brssgo4u:748: nanu kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutiḥ pāpaviṣayā sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ taratīti viśeṣaśruterityata āha-yatrāpi kevala iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:753: anārabdhakārye eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ / BBs_4,1.15 /
GSP33brssgo4u:754: pūrvayoḥ adhikaraṇayoḥ jñānanimittaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vināśaḥ avadhāritaḥ sa kim
GSP33brssgo4u:755: aviśeṣeṇa ārabdhakāryayoḥ anārabdhakāryayoḥ ca bhavati uta viśeṣeṇa anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva iti vicāryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:757: iti evamādiśrutiṣu aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva kṣaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:758: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - anārabdhakārye eva tu iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:759: apravṛttaphale eva pūrve janmāntarasaṃcite asmin api ca janmani prāk jñāna utpatteḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:760: saṃcite sukṛtaduṣkṛte jñāna adhigamāt kṣīyete na tu ārabdhakārye sāmibhuktaphale
GSP33brssgo4u:761: yābhyām etat brahmajñāna āyatanaṃ janma nirmitam /
GSP33brssgo4u:762: kuta etat - 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2)
GSP33brssgo4u:764: itarathā hi jñānāt aśeṣakarmakṣaye sati sthitihetu abhāvāt jñānaprāpti anantarameva kṣemamśnu avīta,
GSP33brssgo4u:766: nanu vastubalena eva ayam akartṛ ātmāvabodhaḥ karmāṇi kṣapayan kathaṃ kānicit kṣapayet kānicit ca upekṣeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:767: na hi samāne agnibījasaṃparke keṣāñcit bījaśaktiḥ kṣīyate keṣāñcit na kṣīyata iti śakyam aṅgīkartum iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:768: ucyate - na tāvat anāśritya ārabdhakāryaṃ karmāśayaṃ jñāna utpattiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:769: āśrite ca tasmin kulālacakravat pravṛttavegasya antarāle pratibandha asaṃbhavāt bhavati vegakṣayapratipālanam /
GSP33brssgo4u:770: akartṛ ātmabodhaḥ api hi mithyājñānabādhanena karmāṇi ucchinatti /
GSP33brssgo4u:771: bādhitam api tu mithyājñānaṃ dvicandrajñānavat saṃskāravaśāt kañcitkālam anuvartata eva /
GSP33brssgo4u:772: api ca na eva atra vivaditavyaṃ brahmavidā kañcitkālaṃ śarīraṃ dhriyate na vā dhriyata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:773: kathaṃ hi ekasya svahṛdayapratyayaṃ brahmavedanaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca apareṇa pratikṣeptuṃ śakyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:775: tasmāt anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya iti nirṇayaḥ // 15 //
GSP33brssgo4u:777: uktakarmakṣayaṃ viṣayīkṛtya kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutestasya tāvadeva ciramiti śruteśca saṃśayamāha-pūrvayoriti /
GSP33brssgo4u:779: pūrvasiddhāntanyāyena pūrvapakṣaprāptau uktotsargataḥ karmakṣatiḥ prārabdhānyakarmaviṣayetyapavādaṃ siddhānyati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:781: prārabdhādyāvanna vimucyate tāvāneva vilambastanmokṣe brahma saṃpadyata iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:791: puṇyasya api aśleṣavināśayoḥ aghanyāyaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ saḥ atideśaḥ sarvapuṇyaviṣaya iti āśaṅkya prativakti - agnihotrādi tu iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:793: yat nityaṃ karma vaidikam agnihotrādi tat tat kāryāya eva bhavati,
GSP33brssgo4u:794: jñānasya yatkāryaṃ tadeva asya api kāryam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:795: kutaḥ - 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssgo4u:797: nanu jñānakarmaṇoḥ vilakṣaṇakāryatvāt kārya ekatva anupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:800: tadvat karmaṇaḥ api jñānasaṃyuktasya mokṣakārya upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:801: nanu anārabhyo mokṣaḥ katham asya karmakāryatvam ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:804: jñānasya eva hi prāpakaṃ satkarma prāṇāḍyā mokṣakāraṇam iti upacaryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:805: ata eva ca atikrāntaviṣayam etat kārya ekatva abhidhānam /
GSP33brssgo4u:806: na hi brahmavida āgāmi agnihotrādi saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:808: saguṇāsu tu vidyāsu kartṛtva anativṛtteḥ saṃbhavati āgāmi api agnihotrādi /
GSP33brssgo4u:809: tasya api nirabhisaṃdhinaḥ kāryāntara abhāvāt vidyāsaṃgati upapattiḥ // 16 //
GSP33brssgo4u:811: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ karma jñānānnaśyati na veti saṃdehe ubhe puṇyapāpe taratītyaviśeṣaśruternaśyatītyāśaṅkyottarasyāpītyuktātideśasya
GSP33brssgo4u:815: atra bhāṣye jñānakarmaṇoḥ sākṣādekakāryatvaṃ paramatenoktvā sākṣātpāramparyābhyāṃ mokṣahetutvaṃ svamatamuktamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:817: nirguṇavidyāyāḥ karmasāhityaṃ tṛptiṃ prati bhojanasya lāṅgaleneva darśitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo4u:821: kiṃviṣayaṃ punaḥ idam aśleṣavināśa vacanaṃ kiṃviṣayaṃ vā ado viniyogavacanam ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:824: ataḥ agnihotrādeḥ nityātkarmaṇaḥ anyāpi hi asti sādhukṛtyā yā phalam abhisaṃdhāya kriyate tasyā eṣa viniyoga ukta ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāmupayanti' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:825: tasyā eva ca idam aghavat aśleṣavināśanirūpaṇam itarasya api evam aśleṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:826: tathā jātīyakasya kāmyasya karmaṇo vidyāṃ prati anupakārakatve saṃpratipattiḥ ubhayoḥ api jaiminibādarāyaṇayoḥ ācāryayoḥ // 17 //
GSP33brssgo4u:828: yatprārabdhādanyatkāmyaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca tadeva vidvatsuhṛddviṣatoḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ karma janayati svayaṃ ca jñānānnaśyatīti bhāvaḥ //17//
GSP33brssgo4u:833: samadhigatam etat anantara adhikaraṇe nityam agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣuṇā mokṣaprayojana
GSP33brssgo4u:835: mokṣaprayojanabrahma adhigamanimittatvena brahmavidyayā saha ekakāryaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:836: tatra agnihotrādi karmāṅgavyapāśrayavidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:837: 'ya evaṃ vidvānayajati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñjuhoti' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñchaṃsati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāngāyati' 'tasmādevaṃvidameva brahmāṇaṃ kurviti nānevaṃ vidaṃ' (chā. 4.17.10)
GSP33brssgo4u:838: 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssgo4u:839: ityādivacanebhyo vidyāsaṃyuktam asti kevalam api asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:840: tatra idaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ vidyāsaṃyuktameva agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣoḥ vidyāhetutvena
GSP33brssgo4u:841: tayā saha ekakāryatvaṃ pratipadyate na kevalam uta vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca aviśeṣeṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:842: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti yajñādīnāmvi aśeṣeṇa ātmavedanāṅgatvena śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:844: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ vidyāsaṃyuktam eva karmāgnihotrādi ātmavidyāśeṣatvaṃ pratipadyate na vidyāhīnam /
GSP33brssgo4u:850: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - yadeva vidyayā iti hi /
GSP33brssgo4u:852: vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ karmāgnihotrādikaṃ vidyāvihīnāt karmaṇaḥ agnihotrāt viśiṣṭaṃ vidvāniva brāhmaṇo vidyāvihīnāt brāhmaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:853: tathā api na atyantam anapekṣaṃ vidyāvihīnaṃ karmāgnihotrādikam /
GSP33brssgo4u:854: kasmāt - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti aviśeṣeṇa agnihotrādeḥ vidyāhetutvena śrutatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:855: nanu vidyāsaṃyuktasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyāvihīnāt viśiṣṭatva avagamāt vidyāvihīnam agnihotrādi ātmavidyāhetutvena anapekṣameva iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:857: vidyāsahāyasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyānimittena sāmarthya atiśayena yogāt ātmajñānaṃ prati kaścit kāraṇa atiśayo bhaviṣyati na tathā vidyāvihīnasya iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo4u:858: natu 'yajñena vividiṣanti' iti atra aviśeṣeṇa ātmajñānāṅgatvena śrutasya agnihotrādeḥ anaṅgatvaṃ śakyam abhyupagantum /
GSP33brssgo4u:859: tathā hi śrutiḥ - 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10)
GSP33brssgo4u:860: iti vidyāsaṃyuktasya karmaṇaḥ agnihotrādeḥ vīryavattaratva abhidhānena svakāryaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:861: prati kañcit atiśayaṃ bruvāṇā vidyāvihīnasya tasya eva tat prayojanaṃ prati vīryavattvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:862: karmaṇa- ca vīryavattvaṃ tat yat svaprayojanasādhanaprasahatvam /
GSP33brssgo4u:863: tasmāt vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ nityam agnihotrādi vidyāvihīnaṃ ca ubhayam api mumukṣuṇā mokṣaprayojana
GSP33brssgo4u:864: uddeśena iha janmani janmāntare ca prāk jñāna utpatteḥ kṛtaṃ yat tat yathāsāmarthyaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:866: pratipadyamānaṃ śravaṇa manana śraddhā tātparyādi antaraṅgakāraṇāpekṣaṃ brahmavidyayā
GSP33brssgo4u:872: bhavatu vidyāviśiṣṭasya karmaṇo jñānaṃ prati śīghrakāritvākhyaḥ kaścidatiśayo vidyāsāmarthyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:874: naca tatra śrutau yajñādiśabdānāṃ vidyopetakarmaparatayā saṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:876: 'yadeva vidyayā'iti śrutiḥ kevalasyāpi vīryavattvaṃ gamayatīti siddhāntagranthārthaḥ //18//
GSP33brssgo4u:880: bhogena tv itare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate / BBs_4,1.19 /
GSP33brssgo4u:881: anārabdhakāryayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya uktaḥ itare tu ārabdhakārye
GSP33brssgo4u:882: puṇyapāpe upabhogena kṣapayitvā brahma saṃpadyate 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye
GSP33brssgo4u:885: nanu sati api samyak darśane yathā prāk dehapātāt bhedadarśanaṃ dvicandradarśananyāyena anuvṛttamevaṃ paścāt api anuvarteta / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:887: upabhogaśeṣakṣapaṇaṃ hi tatra anuvṛttinimittaṃ na ca tādṛśamātra kiñcit asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:888: nanu aparaḥ karmāśayoḥ abhinavam upabhogm ārapsyate / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:890: mithyājñāna avaṣṭambhaṃ hi karmāntaraṃ dehapāta upabhogāntaram ārabhate tat ca mithyājñāna
GSP33brssgo4u:891: avaṣṭambhaṃ hi karmāntaraṃ dehapāta upabhogāntaram ārabhate tatca mithyājñānaṃ samyak
GSP33brssgo4u:892: jñānena dagdham ityataḥ sādhu etat ārabdhakāryakṣaye viduṣaḥ kaivalyam avaśyaṃ bhavati iti // 19 //
GSP33brssgo4u:895: sa kiṃ prārabdhakṣayānantaraṃ saṃsaratyuta neti nimittabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye siddhāntamupakramate-anārabdheti /
GSP33brssgo4u:900: yattu saṃcitaṃ karmāntaraṃ tanna nimittaṃ phalasya,
GSP33brssgo4u:902: avidyādayo hi kleśāḥ karmaṇastatphalasya ca mūlam /
GSP33brssgo4u:903: taduktaṃ yogaśāstre 'kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayaḥ sati mūle tādvipākaḥ'iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:904: tacca mūlaṃ jñānāgninā dagdhamiti kutaḥ punaḥ saṃsārastasmāddehapāte kaivalyamiti siddham //19//
GSP33brssgo4u:915: atha aparāsu vidyāsu phalaprāptaye devayānaṃ panthānam avatārayiṣyan prathamaṃ tāvat yathāśāstram utkrāntikramam anvācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo4u:916: samānā hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥ iti vakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo4u:917: asti prāyaṇaviṣayā śrutiḥ 'asya somya puruṣasya prayato vāk manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇa- tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām' (chā. 6.8.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:918: kim iha vāca eva vṛttimattyā manasi saṃpattiḥ ucyata uta vāgvṛtteḥiti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:919: tatra vāk eva tāvat manasi saṃpadyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:922: śrutilakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā /
GSP33brssgo4u:923: tasmāt vāca eva ayaṃ manasi pralaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:924: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vāk vṛttiḥ iti vyākhyāte yāvatā vāk menasi iti eva ācāryaḥ paṭhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:926: paṭhiṣyati tu purastāt 'avibhāgo vacanāt' (bra. sū. 4.2.16) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:927: tasmāt atra vṛtti upaśamamātraṃ vivakṣitam iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:928: tattvapralayavivakṣāyāṃ tu sarvatra eva avibhāgasāmyāt kiṃ paratra eva viśiṣyāt avibhāga iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:930: vāk vṛttiḥ pūrvam upasaṃhriyate manovṛttau avasthitāyām iti arthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:933: dṛśyate hi vāk vṛtteḥ pūrva upasaṃhāro manovṛttau vidyamānāyām /
GSP33brssgo4u:934: nanu śrutisāmarthyāt vāca eva ayaṃ manasi apyayo yukta iti uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:937: yasya hi yata utpattiḥ tasya tatra pralayo nyāyyo mṛdīva śarāvasya /
GSP33brssgo4u:938: na ca manaso vāk utpadyata iti kiñcana pramāṇam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:939: vṛttyutti udbhava abhibhavau tu aprakṛtisamāśrayau api dṛśyete /
GSP33brssgo4u:940: pārthivebhyo hi indhanebhyaḥ taijasasya agneḥ vṛttiḥ udbhavati apsu ca upaśāmyati /
GSP33brssgo4u:941: kathaṃ tarhi asmin pakṣe śabdo vāk manasi saṃpadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:943: śabdaḥ api asmin pakṣe avakalpate vṛttivṛttimatoḥ abheda upacārāt iti arthaḥ // 1 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo4u:959: uttaratra hi sūtrakṛttattvavida indriyāṇāṃ svarūpalayaṃ vakṣyati tadbalādihādhyāhāra ucitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:961: prakṛtāveva vikāralaya iti nyāyaviruddhārthaṃ śrutirapi na brūta iti siddhāntayati-atatprakṛtitvāditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:962: nyāyasya niravakāśatvādbalīyastvaṃ śabdasya tūktirvāgitivyutpattyā lakṣaṇayā vā sāvakāśatvamiti dyotayituṃ śabdāccetyuktam //1//
GSP33brssgo4u:968: iti atra aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eva indriyāṇāṃ manasi saṃpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:969: tatra api ata eva vāca iva cakṣurādīnām api savṛttike manasi avasthite vṛttilopadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo4u:970: tattvapralaya asaṃbhavāt śabda upapatteḥ ca vṛttidvāreṇa eva sarvāṇi indriyāṇi manaḥ anuvartante /
GSP33brssgo4u:971: sarveṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ manasi upasaṃhāra aviśeṣe sati vācaḥ pṛthak grahaṇaṃ vāk manasi saṃpadyata iti udāharaṇa anurodhena // 2 //
GSP33brssgo4u:975: sarvendriyavṛttilayaścediṣṭastarhi vāṅmanasīti pṛthaksūtraṃ kimarthamityata āha-sarveṣāṃ karaṇānāmiti //2//
GSP33brssgo4u:983: iti kim atra api vṛttisaṃpattiḥ eva vivakṣyata uta vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ iti vicikitsāyāṃ vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ eva atra iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:984: śruti anugrahāt tat prakṛtikatva upapatteḥ ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:985: tathā hi - 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥprāṇaḥ' (chā. 6.5.4)
GSP33brssgo4u:986: iti annayoni mana ātmananti ap yoniṃ ca prāṇam /
GSP33brssgo4u:988: ata- ca yat manaḥ prāṇe prakṛtivikāra abhedāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:989: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat api agṛhīta bāhya indriyavṛtti mano vṛttidvāreṇa eva prāṇe pralīyate iti uttarāt vākyāt avagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:990: tathā hi suṣupso- mumūrṣoḥ ca prāṇavṛttau parispanda ātmikāyām avasthitāyāṃ manovṛttīnām upaśamo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:991: na ca manasaḥ svarūpa apyayaḥ prāṇe saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:995: na hi īdṛśena prāṇāḍikena tat prakṛtitvena manaḥ prāṇe saṃpattum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:996: evam api hi anne manaḥ saṃpadyeta apsu ca annam apsu eva ca prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:997: na hi etasmin api pakṣe prāṇabhāvapariṇatābhyaḥ adbhyo mano jāyata iti kiñcana pramāṇam asti tasmāt na manasaḥ prāṇe svarūpa apyayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:998: vṛtti apyaye api tu śabdaḥ avakalpate vṛttivattimatoḥ abheda upacārāt iti darśitam // 3 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1002: kṛtaḥ iha tvabātmakaprāṇasya annātmakamanaḥprakṛtitvena prakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugrahānna manaḥśrutirbādhyeti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ pūrvavat,
GSP33brssgo4u:1003: siddhāntastvabannayoḥ prakṛtivikṛtibhāve 'pi na tadvikārayoḥ prāṇamanasostadbhāvo himaghaṭayorapi tadbhāvaprasaṅgādato nyāyavirodhātpūrvavacchrutirbādhyeti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1004: āgṛhītā bāhyendriyavṛttayo yena tattathā līnendriyavṛttikaṃ mano 'pi vṛttilayenaiva prāṇe līyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1012: sthitam etat yasya yato na utpattiḥ tasya tasmin vṛttipralayo na svarūpapralaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1013: idam idānīṃ prāṇaḥ tejasi iti atra cintyate -
GSP33brssgo4u:1014: kiṃ yathāśruti prāṇasya tejasi eva vṛtti upasaṃhāraḥ kiṃvā deha indriyapañjara adhyakṣe jīva iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1015: tatra śruteḥ anatiśaṅkyatvāt prāṇasya tejasi eva saṃpattiḥ syāt aśrutakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1016: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate saḥ adhyakṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1017: sa prakṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣe avidyākarmapūrvaprajña upādhike vijñāna ātmani avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1018: tat pradhānā prāṇavṛttiḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1020: evam eva imam ātmānam antakāle sarve prāṇā abhisāmayanti yatra etat ūrdhva ucchvāsī bhavati iti hi śrutyantaram adhyakṣa upagāminaḥ sarvān prāṇān aviśeṣeṇa darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1022: iti pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya adhyakṣa anugāmitāṃ darśayati tat anuvṛttitāṃ ca itareṣām /
GSP33brssgo4u:1024: 'savijñāno bhavati' iti ca adhyakṣasya antarvijñānavattva pradarśanena tasmin apītakaraṇagrāmasya prāṇasya avasthānaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1025: nanu prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrūyate kathaṃ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣa iti adhikāvāpaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1027: adhyakṣapradhānatvāt utkramaṇādivyavahārasya śrutyantaragatasya api ca viśeṣasya apekṣaṇīyatvāt // 4 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1029: uktanyāyasiddhaṃ prāṇasyāpi vṛttilayamupajīvya 'prāṇastejasi'iti śruterūpagamādiśruteśca saṃśayamuktvā jīve layaṃ vināpi upagamādisaṃbhava iti pūrvapakṣayati-sthitamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1031: siddhānte tu bhūtopahita jīvalakṣakatvamiti matvā sūtraṃ yojayati-sa prakṛta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1033: taṃ jīvaṃ prati prāṇānāmupagamānugamanāvasthānaśrutibhya iti hetvarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1034: yathā yātrecchāvantaṃ rājānaṃ bhṛtyā upagacchantyevameva paralokaṃ jigamiṣuṃ jīvaṃ sarve prāṇā abhimukhyenāyāntītyupagamaḥ śrutaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1037: jīvasya prāptavyaphalāvagamāya hi vijñānasāhityaśrutyāḥ mukhyaprāṇasahitakaraṇānāṃ jīve sthitirbhātītyarthaḥ //4//
GSP33brssgo4u:1040: kathaṃ tarhi prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrutiḥ iti ata āha -
GSP33brssgo4u:1042: sa prāṇasaṃpṛktaḥ adhyakṣaḥ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu dehabījabhūteṣu sūkṣmeṣu avatiṣṭhata iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1044: nanu ca iyaṃ śrutiḥ prāṇasya tejasi sthitiṃ darśayati na prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya /
GSP33brssgo4u:1046: saḥ adhyakṣa iti adhyakṣasya api antarāle api upasaṃkhyātatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1047: yaḥ api hi srughnānmathurāṃ gatvā mathurāyāḥ pāṭaliputraṃ vrajati saḥ api srughnātpāṭaliputraṃ yāti iti śakyate vaditum /
GSP33brssgo4u:1048: tasmāt prāṇaḥ tejasi iti prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya eva etat tejaḥ sahacariteṣu bhūteṣu avasthānam // 5 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1049: yadyapi prāṇasya tejasyavyavadhānena layaḥ śrutastathāpyubhayaśrutyanugrahāya prāṇo jīve līyate,
GSP33brssgo4u:1050: jīvadvārā ca tadupādhiṣu tejaādibhūteṣviti śrutyarthasphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhṇāti-kathaṃ tarhīti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1051: naca layaṃ vināpi jīvaṃ pratyipagamādisaṃbhavāttejaḥ śrutirmukhyāstviti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1052: jīvaṃ pratyāgatya prāṇasya nirvyāpāratvena sthiterevātra layatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1053: bhūteṣu jīvasthitiḥ kiṃ balādvyākhyāyata ityāśaṅkya 'so 'dhyakṣe'iti sūtrodāhṛtaśrutibalādityāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1057: kathaṃ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu iti ucyate yāvat ekameva śrūyate prāṇaḥ tejasi iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1060: na ekasmin eva tejasi śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ jīvaḥ avatiṣṭhate kāryasya śarīrasya anekātmakatvadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1061: darśayataḥ ca etam arthaṃ praśnaprativacane 'āpaḥ puruṣavacasaḥ' (chā. 5.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1065: smṛtiḥ api 'aṇvyo mātrāvināśinyo daśārdhānāṃ tu yāḥsmṛtāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1067: nanu ca upasaṃhṛteṣu vāk ādiṣu karaṇeṣu śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ 'kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavati' (bṛ. 3.2.13)
GSP33brssgo4u:1068: iti upakramya śrutyantaraṃ karmāśrayatāṃ nirūpayati - 'tau ha yadūcatuḥ karma haiva tadūcaturatha ha yatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ karma haiva tatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1069: atra ucyate - tatra karmaprayuktasya graha atigrahasaṃjñakastha indriyaviṣayātmakasya bandhanasya pravṛttiḥ iti karmāśrayatā uktā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1070: iha punaḥ bhūta upādānāt dehāntara utpattiḥ iti bhūtāśrayatvam uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1071: praśaṃsāśabdāt api tatra prādhānyamātraṃ karmaṇaḥ pradarśitaṃ na tu āśrayāntaraṃ nivāritam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1080: daśārdhānāṃ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmabhāgā iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo4u:1088: sā iyam utkrāntiḥ kiṃ vidvat aviduṣoḥ samānā kiṃvā viśeṣavati iti viśayānānāṃ viśeṣavati iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1094: nanu vidyāprakaraṇe samāmnānāt viduṣa eva eṣā bhavet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1096: tathā hi 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma' 'aśiśiṣati nāma' 'pipāsati nāma' (chā. 6.8.3,5)
GSP33brssgo4u:1097: iti ca sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇā eva svāpādayaḥ anukīrtyante vidyāprakaraṇe api pratipādayiṣitavastupratipādana anuguṇyena na tu viduṣo viśeṣavanto vidhitsyante /
GSP33brssgo4u:1098: evam iyam api utkrāntiḥ mahājanagata eva anukīrtyate yasyāṃ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ puruṣasya prayataḥ tejaḥ saṃpadyate sa ātmā tattvamasi iti etat pratipādayitum /
GSP33brssgo4u:1099: pratiṣiddhā ca eṣā viduṣaḥ 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1101: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - samānā ca eṣa utkrāntiḥ vāk manasi ityādyā vidvat aviduṣoḥ āsṛti upakramāt bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1103: aviruddhān dehabījabhūtāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi āśritya karmaprayukto dehagrahaṇam anubhavituṃ saṃsarati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1105: tat etat āsṛti upakramāt iti uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1106: nanu amṛtatvaṃ hi viduṣā prāptavyaṃ na ca tat deśāntara āyattaṃ tatra kṛto bhūta āśrayatvaṃ sṛti upakramo vā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1108: adagdhvā atyantam avidyādīn kleśān aparavidyāsāmarthyāt āpekṣikam amṛtatvaṃ prepsate saṃbhavati tatra sṛti upakramo bhūta āśrayatvaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:1109: ne hi nirāśrayāṇāṃ prāṇānāṃ gatiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1111: evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇāṃ manasi prathamaṃ vṛttilayalābhāttato manovṛtteḥ prāṇe layaḥ prāṇavṛtterbhūtopahitajīve laya ityutkrāntivyavasthoktā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1120: na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantīti pratiṣedho 'pi tadviṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1123: tata upāsako mūrdhanyanāḍīdvārārcirādimārgaṃ prāpnoti nānya iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1125: na mukhyaṃ 'yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate so 'sya saṃkalpādeva samuttiṣṭhati'iti bhogaśravaṇādityāha-anupoṣya cedamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1132: iti atra prakaraṇasāmarthyāt tat yathāprakṛtaṃ tejaḥ sādhyakṣaṃ saprāṇaṃ sakaraṇagrāmaṃ bhūtāntarasahitaṃ prayataḥ puṃsaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ saṃpadyata iti etat uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1133: kīdṛśī punaḥ iyaṃ saṃpattiḥ syāt iti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1134: tatra ātyantika eva tāvat svarūpapravilaya iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1136: sarvasya hi janimato vastujātasya prakṛtiḥ parā devatā iti pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1138: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat teja ādi bhūtasūkṣmaṃ śrotrādikaraṇāśrayabhūtamāpīterā saṃsāramokṣāt samyak jñānanimittāt avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1142: anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇasamaya eva upādhipratyastamayāt atyantaṃ brahma saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:1143: tatra vidhiśāstram anarthakaṃ syāt vidyāśāstraṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:1144: mithyājñānanimittaḥ ca bandho na samyak jñānāt ṛte visraṃsitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1145: tasmāt tat prakṛtitve api suṣuptapralayavat bījabhāva avaśeṣa eva eṣā saṃtsapattiḥ iti // 8 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1147: pūrvodāhṛtotkrāntivākyaśeṣaṃ vyākhyāya liṅgāśrayapañcabhūtānāṃ kimātyantiko brahmaṇi laya utānātyantika iti layasyobhayathādarśanātsaṃśayamāha-kīdṛśī punariyamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1153: tat ca itarabhūtasahitaṃ tejo jīvasya asmāt śarīrāt pravasata āśrayabhūtaṃ svarūpataḥ pramāṇataḥ ca sūkṣmaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1154: tathā hi - nāḍīniṣkramaṇaśravaṇādibhyaḥ asya saukṣmyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1157: ata eva ca dehāt nirgacchan pārśvasthaiḥ na upalabhyate // 9 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1158: nanu liṅgātmakasya tejasaḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmatamanāḍīdvārā gatiḥ kuto vā kenacinmūrtena pratighāto nāsti kuto vā na dṛśyata ityata āha-sūkṣmamiti
GSP33brssgo4u:1162: ata eva sūkṣmatvāt na asya sthūlasya śarīrasya upamardena dāhādinimittena itarat sūkṣmaṃ śarīram upapadyate // 10 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1167: asya eva ca sūkṣmasyā śarīrasya eṣa ūṣmā yam etasmin śarīre saṃsparśena ūṣmāṇaṃ vijānanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1168: tathā hi mṛtāvasthāyām avasthite api dehe vidyamāneṣu api ca rūpādiṣu dehaguṇeṣu
GSP33brssgo4u:1169: na ūṣma upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata dehaguṇeṣu na ūṣma
GSP33brssgo4u:1170: upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata upapadyate prasiddhaśarīravyatiriktavyapāśraya eva eṣa ūṣma iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1171: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'uṣṇa eva jīviṣyañśito mariṣyan iti' // 11 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1176: pratiṣedhād iti cen na śārīrāt / BBs_4,2.12 /
GSP33brssgo4u:1177: 'amṛtatvaṃ cānupoṣya' iti ato viśeṣaṇāt ātyantike amṛtatve gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvo abhyupagataḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1178: tatra api kenacit kāraṇena utkrāntim āśaṅkya pratiṣedhati - 'athākāmayamāno yo 'kāmo
GSP33brssgo4u:1179: niṣkāma āptakāma ātmakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyeti' (bṛ. 4.4.6)
GSP33brssgo4u:1180: iti ataḥ paravidyāviṣayāt pratiṣedhāt na parabrahmavido dehāt prāṇānām utkrāntiḥ asti iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:1182: yataḥ śārīrāt ātmana eṣa utkrāntipratiṣedhaḥ prāṇānāṃ na śarīrāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1183: katham avagamyate 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmanti' iti śākhāntare pañcamī prayogāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1184: saṃbandhasāmānyaviṣayā hi ṣaṣṭhī śākhāntaragatayā pañcamyā saṃbandhaviśeṣe vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1185: tasmāt iti ca prādhānyāt abhyudayaniḥśreyasa adhikṛto dehī saṃbadhyate na dehaḥ / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1186: tasmāt uccikramiṣoḥ jīvāt prāṇā apakrāmanti saha eva tena bhavanti iti arthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1190: sakāmasya saṃsāroktyanantaraṃ niṣkāmasya muktiprakaraṇārtho 'thaśabdaḥ ātmakāmatvāt pūrṇānandātmavittvādāptakāmaḥ prāptaparamānandaḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1194: jñānina utkrāntirasti na veti pañcamīṣaṣṭhīśrutibhyāṃ saṃdehe siddhāntiśaṅkānirāsapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣayati-netyādinā //12//
GSP33brssgo4u:1197: saprāṇasya ca pravasato bhavati utkrāntiḥ dehāt iti evaṃ prāpte prati ucyate -
GSP33brssgo4u:1199: na tat asti yat uktaṃ parabrahmavidaḥ api dehāt asti utkrāntiḥ utkrāntipratiṣedhasya deha upādānatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1200: yato deha upādāna eva utkrāntipratiṣedha ekeṣāṃ samāmnātṛṇāṃ spaṣṭa upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1201: tathā hi - ārtabhāgapraśne 'yatrāyaṃ puruṣo mriyata udasmātprāṇāḥ krāmantyāho neti' (bṛ. 3.2.11)
GSP33brssgo4u:1203: iti anutkrāntipakṣaṃ parigṛhya na tarhi ayam anutkrānteṣu prāṇeṣu mriyata iti asyām
GSP33brssgo4u:1204: āśaṅkāyām 'atraiva samavanīyanta' iti pravilayaṃ prāṇānāṃ pratijñāya tat siddhaye
GSP33brssgo4u:1206: iti saśabdaparāmṛṣṭasya prakṛtasya utkrānti avadheḥ ucchvayanādīni samāmananti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1209: tat sāmānyāt 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante' iti atra api abheda upacāreṇa dehāpādānasya eva utkramaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1210: yadi api prādhānyaṃ dehina iti vyākhyeyaṃ yeṣāṃ pañcamī pāṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1211: yeṣāṃ tu ṣaṣṭhīpāṭhaḥ teṣāṃ vidvat saṃbandhini utkrāntiḥ pratiṣidhyata iti prāpta utkrāntipratiṣedhārthatvāt asya vākyasya dehapādāna eva sā pratiṣiddhā bhavati,
GSP33brssgo4u:1213: api ca 'cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhyastamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmati prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2)
GSP33brssgo4u:1214: iti evam avidvat viṣayaṃ saprapañcam utkramaṇaṃ saṃsāragamanaṃ ca darśayitvā 'iti nu kāmayamānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.6)
GSP33brssgo4u:1216: iti vyapadiśya vidvāṃsaṃ yadi tat viṣaye api utkrāntameva prāpadeyasamañjasa eva vyapadeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1217: tasmāt avidviṣaye prāptayoḥ gati utkrāntyoḥ vidvat viṣaye pratiṣedha iti evameva vyākhyeyaṃ vyapadeśārthavattvāya /
GSP33brssgo4u:1218: na ca brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya prakṣīṇakāmakarmaṇa utkrāntiḥ gatiḥ vā upapadyate nimitta abhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1219: 'atra brahma samaśnute' iti ca evañjātīyakāḥ śrutayo gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvaṃ sūcayanti // 13 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1221: smaryate api ca mahābhārate gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvaḥ - 'sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya samyagbhūtāni paśyataḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1222: devā api mārge muhyantyapadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1223: nanu gatiḥ iti brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya smaryate 'śukaḥ kila vaiyāsakirmumukṣurādityamaṇḍalamabhipratasthe pitrā cānugamyāhūto bho iti pratiśuśrāva' iti / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1224: saśarīrasya eva ayaṃ yogabalena viśiṣṭadeśaprāptipūrvakaḥ śarīra utsarga iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1226: na hi aśarīraṃ gacchantaṃ sarvabhūtāni draṣṭuṃ śaknuyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1227: tathā ca tatra evaupasaṃhṛtam- 'śukastu mārutācchīghrāṃ gatiṃ kṛtvāntarikṣagaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1231: kāṇvaśrutau tāvattasyeti sarvanāmnā prakṛtaṃ jñāninaṃ parāmṛśya saṃbandhasāmānyamuktaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1232: tatra mādhyandinaśākhāyāṃ tasmādityapādānatvarūpaviśeṣa ukto grāhyastathāca jīvātprāṇotkrāntipratiṣedho
GSP33brssgo4u:1233: bhāti na dehāttacchabdena dehasyānuktestasmājjñānino 'pyutkrāntirastīti jñānavaiyarthyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1239: yeṣāṃ pañcamīpāṭhasteṣāṃ yadyapi dehinaḥ prādhānyaṃ tathāpi dehadehinorabhedāttasmāditi dehaṃ parāmṛśya tadāpādana evotkrāntipratiṣedha iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1242: saṃbandhaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ bhoktā prāṇānāṃ bhogopakaraṇatvaviśeṣo 'traiva prāṇamayo manomayaḥ iti pūrvaśrutyukto grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1244: ato vidvatsaṃbandhiprāṇānāmutkrāntyapādānāpekṣāyāṃ cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdhnovetyuktadehapradeśā eva grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1245: tathācāyamarthaḥ-tasya viduṣo bhogopakaraṇātmakāḥ prāṇāḥ dehapradeśebhyo notkrāmantīti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1246: evaṃ ca prāptotkrāntiniṣedhārthatvaṃ vākyasyeti sarvaṃ caturasram /
GSP33brssgo4u:1248: samyagātmabhāvena bhūtāni paśyataḥ apadasya prāpyapadarahitasya padaiṣiṇo devā api mārge muhyanti mārgaṃ na jānanti tadabhāvāditi smṛtiyojanā
GSP33brssgo4u:1257: tāni pare tathā hy āha / BBs_4,2.15 /
GSP33brssgo4u:1258: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditāni indriyāṇi bhūtāni ca parabrahmavidaḥ tasmin eva parasmin ātmani pralīyante /
GSP33brssgo4u:1260: tathā hi āha śrutiḥ - 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti (praśna. 6.5) iti.
GSP33brssgo4u:1262: iti vidvat viṣaya eva aparā śrutiḥ parasmāt ātmanaḥ anyatra api kalānāṃ pralayam āha sma / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1264: pārthivādyāḥ kalāḥ pṛthivyādiḥ eva svaprakṛtīḥ apīyanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1266: kṛtsnaṃ kalājātaṃ parabrahmavido brahma eva saṃpadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1269: pūrvatra gatiniṣedhena vidvatkalānāṃ ghrāṇādīnāmatraiva laya uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1270: tamupajīvya sa kiṃ tattatkalāprakṛtiṣu pṛthivyādiṣu syāduta paramātmanīti śrutidvayadarśanātsaṃśayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1271: tatra sākṣātprakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugṛhītayā 'gatāḥ kalāḥ'iti śrutyā pūrvapakṣamagre vadannādau siddhāntamāha-tānīti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1272: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya līyante evamevāsya paritaḥ sarvatra brahmadraṣṭurimāḥ prāṇaśraddhādyāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣe kalpitāḥ puruṣameva jñeyaṃ prāpya layaṃ gacchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1276: vastugatyā vidvaddṛṣṭyā paramātmani kalālaye 'pi lokadṛṣṭyā pratiṣṭhāsu layoktiraviruddhā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1277: tathāca kalāḥ svaprakṛtiṣu vilāpya tābhiḥ saha puruṣe līyante iti śrutidvayatātparyam //15//
GSP33brssgo4u:1282: sa puna- viduṣaḥ kalāpralayaḥ kim itareṣām iva sāvaśeṣo bhavati āhosvit niravaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1283: tatra pralayasāmānyāt śakti avaśeṣatāprasaktau bravīti - avibhāgāpattiḥ eva iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1285: tathā hi kalāpralayam uktvā vakti - 'bhidyate tāsāṃ nāmarūpe puruṣa ityevaṃ procyate sa eṣo 'kalo 'mṛto bhavati' (pra. 6.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1286: avidyā nimittānāṃ ca kalānāṃ na vidyānimitte pralaye sāvaśeṣatva upapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1301: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā / BBs_4,2.17 /
GSP33brssgo4u:1304: samānā ca asṛti upakramāt vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥiti uktaṃ tam idānīṃ sati upakramaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1305: tasya upasaṃhṛtavāgādi kalāpasya uccikramiṣato vijñānātmana oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayam 'sa etāstejomātrāḥ samabhyādadāno hṛdayamevānvavakrāmati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1306: tat agraprajvalanapūrvikā cakṣurādisthāna apādānā ca utkrāntiḥ śrūyate - 'tasya haitasya
GSP33brssgo4u:1307: hṛdayasyāgraṃ pradyotate tena pradyotenaiṣa ātmā niṣkrāmati cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo
GSP33brssgo4u:1309: sā kim aniyamena eva vidvat aviduṣoḥ bhavati atha asti kaścit viduṣo viśeṣaniyama
GSP33brssgo4u:1310: iti vicikitsāyāṃ śruti aviśeṣāt aniyamaprāptau ācaṣṭe - samā api hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1311: hṛdayāgrapradyotane tat prakāśitadvāratve ca mūrdhasthānāt eva vidvān niṣkrāmati
GSP33brssgo4u:1314: yadi vidvān apītaravat yataḥ kutaścit dehadeśāt utkrāmeta na eva utkṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ labheta /
GSP33brssgo4u:1316: tat śeṣagati anusmṛtiyogāt ca vidyāśeṣabhūtā ca mūrdhani anāḍīsaṃbaddhā gatiḥ anuśīlayitavyā vidyāviśeṣeṣu vihitā tām abhyasyan tasya eva pratiṣṭhita iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1317: tasmāt hṛdayālayena brahmaṇā su upāsitena anugṛhītaḥ tadbhāvaṃ samāpanno vidvān mūrdhanyayā eva śatādhikayā śatāt atiriktayā ekaśatatamyā nāḍyā niṣkrāmati itarābhiḥ itare /
GSP33brssgo4u:1318: tathā hi hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1323: tasya hṛdayasyāgraṃ nāḍīmukhaṃ tasya jvalanaṃ bhāviphalasphuraṇaṃ pradyotākhyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1324: cakṣuṣo vetyaniyamaśrutestayorghvamāyanniti viśeṣaśruteśca saṃśayaḥ-kimupāsako 'pyanupāsakavadyena kenaciddvāreṇa nirgacchati uta mūrdhanyanāḍyaiveti
GSP33brssgo4u:1328: yena kenacinmārgeṇa nirgatasyāpi brahmalokaprāptau vidyaśeṣatvena mārgānusmṛtividheḥ kevalādṛṣṭārthatvaṃ syādato 'nvahaṃ smṛtenaiva mārgeṇa gamanaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1331: suṣumnākhyā nāḍī hṛdayāt nirgatā dakṣiṇākṣitālukaṇṭhāntastananāsikāmadhyābhittidvārā brahmarandhraṃ prāptā sūryaraśmibhirekīkṛtā brahmalokamārga upāsakasyeti sthitam //17//
GSP33brssgo4u:1336: asti hārdavidyā - 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma' (chā. 8.1.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:1338: tat prakriyāyām 'atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ' (chā. 8.6.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:1339: iti upakramya saprapañcaṃ nāḍīraśmisaṃbandham uktvā uktam 'atha yatraitadasmāccharīrādutkrāmatyathaitaireva raśmibhirūrdhvamākramate' (chā. 8.6.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1341: tasmāt śatādhikayā nāḍyā niṣkrāman raśmi anusārī niṣkrāmati iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1342: tat kiṃm aviśeṣeṇa eva ahani rātrau vā mriyamāṇasya raśmi anusāritvam āhosvit ahani eva iti saṃśaye sati aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva tāvat raśmi anusāri iti pratijñāyate // 18 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1345: atha prārabdhānte etadutkramaṇaṃ yadā syādatha tadā etaireva nāḍīsaṃbaddhai raśmibhirutkrāmatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1352: niśi neti cen na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca / BBs_4,2.19 /
GSP33brssgo4u:1353: asti ahani nāḍīraśmisaṃbandha iti ahani mṛtasya syāt raśmi anusāritvaṃ rātrau tu pretasya na syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1357: darśayati ca etamarthaṃ śrutiḥ - 'amuṣmādādityātpratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ' (chā. 8.6.2)
GSP33brssgo4u:1358: iti nidāghasamaye ca niśāsu api kiraṇa anuvṛttiḥ upalabhyate pratāpādikāryadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1359: stoka anuvṛtteḥ tu durlakṣyatvam ṛtvantararajanīṣu śaiśireṣu iva durdineṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:1361: yadi ca rātrau preto vinā eva raśmi anusāreṇa ūrdhvam ākrameta raśmi anusāra ānarthakyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo4u:1362: na hi etat viśiṣya adhīyate yo divā praiti sa raśmīn apekṣya ūrdvam ākramate yaḥ tu rātrau saḥ anapekṣya eva iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1363: atha tu vidvān api rātriprāyaṇa aparādhamātreṇa na ūrdhvam ākrameta pākṣikaphalā vidyā iti apravṛttiḥ eva tasyāṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1365: atha api rātrau uparataḥ aharāgamam udīkṣeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:1366: aharāgame api asya kadācit araśmisaṃbandhārhaṃ śarīraṃ syāt pāvakādisaṃparkāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1369: tasmāt tat aviśeṣeṇa eva idaṃ rātridivaṃ raśmi anusāritvam // 19 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1371: śirā nāḍyaḥ pratāyante vistṛtā bhavanti sṛptāḥ saṃbaddhāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1375: kiñca yadi rātrau mṛtasya raśmiyogaṃ vinaivordhvagatiḥ syāttadā raśmiśruterdivāmṛtaviṣayatayā saṃkocaḥ syādūrdhvagatyabhāve ca vidyāyāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1383: ata eva ca udīkṣā anupapatteḥ apākṣikaphalatvāt ca vidyāyā aniyatakālatvāt ca mṛtyoḥ dakṣiṇa ayane api mriyamāṇo vidvān prāpnoti eva vidyāphalam
GSP33brssgo4u:1384: uttarāyaṇa maraṇa prāśasti aprasiddherbhīṣmasya ca pratīkṣādarśanāt 'āpūryamāṇapakṣādyānṣaḍudaṅṅeti māsāṃstān' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssgo4u:1385: iti ca śruteḥ apekṣitavyam uttarāyaṇam iti imām āśaṅkām anena sūtreṇa apanudati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1388: śruteḥ tu arthaṃ vakṣyati 'ātivāhikāstalliṅgāt' (bra. sū. 4.3.4) iti // 20 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1389: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyane mṛto vidvānvidyāphalamāpnoti na veti vidyāyā nityavatphalaśruteruttarāyaṇaprāśastyaśāstrācca saṃdehe pūrvoktahetūnatidiśati-ataścāyane 'pi dakṣiṇe /
GSP33brssgo4u:1393: tathāca devatāyāḥ sadā sattvādvidyayā dakṣiṇāyanakāle 'pi tatprāptiraviruddheti bhāvaḥ //20//
GSP33brssgo4u:1396: nanu ca - 'yatra kāle tvanāvṛttimāvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1397: prayātā yānti taṃ phalaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha' (gī. 8.23)
GSP33brssgo4u:1398: iti kālaprādhānyena upakramya aharādikālaviśeṣaḥ smṛtau apunarāvṛttaye niyamitaḥ kathaṃ rātrau dakṣiṇāyane vā prayāto anāvṛttiṃ yāyāditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:1400: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite / BBs_4,2.21 /
GSP33brssgo4u:1401: yoginaḥ prati ca ayam aharādikālaviniyogaḥ anāvṛttaye smaryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1402: smārte ca ete yogasāṃkhye na śraute /
GSP33brssgo4u:1403: ato viṣayabhedāt pramāṇāviśeṣāt ca na asya smārtasya kālaviniyogasya śrauteṣu vijñāneṣu avatāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1406: iti ca śrautau etau devayānapitṛyāṇau pratyabhijñāyete smṛtau api iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1408: iti smṛtau kālapratijñānāt virodham āśaṅkya parihāra uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1409: yadā punaḥ smṛtau api agnyādyā devatā eva ativāhikyo gṛhyante tadā na kaścit virodha iti // 21 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1412: smārtayogināṃ tu kālāpekṣā smṛtāvucyata ityavirodhamāha-yogina iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1413: yogī daharādyupāsaka eva smṛtyuktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-smārte ceti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1414: bhagavadārādhanabuddhyānuṣṭhitaṃ karma yogaḥ 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1415: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1420: yadi tu śrautārthapratyabhijñayā kālaśabdo devatāparastarhyaikārthyameveti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1423: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavataḥ kṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1424: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthadhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1429: atra pāde saguṇavidyāvato mṛtasya uttaramārga abhidhānam
GSP33brssgo4u:1432: āsṛti upakramāt samāna utkrāntiḥ iti uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1437: 'yadā vai puruṣo 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.10.1) iti aparā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1440: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ parasparaṃ bhinnā etāḥ sṛtaya kiṃ va eka eva anekaviśeṣaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1441: tatra prāptaṃ tāvat bhinnāḥ etāḥ sṛtaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1446: tvarāvacanaṃ ca pīḍyeta 'sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchati' (chā. 8.6.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1447: tasmāt anyonyabhinnā eva ete panthāna iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1448: evaṃ prāpte abhidadhmahe - arcirādina iti - sarvo brahmaprepsuḥ arcirādina eva adhvanā raṃhati iti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssgo4u:1450: prathito hi eṣa mārgaḥ sarveṣāṃ viduṣām /
GSP33brssgo4u:1451: tathā hi pañcāgnividyāprakaraṇe 'ye 'cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssgo4u:1452: iti vidyāntaraśīlinām api arcirādikā sṛtiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1454: yāsu vidyāsu na kācit gatiḥ ucyate tāsu iyam arcirādika upatiṣṭhatāṃ yāsu tu anyā śrāvyate tāsu kim iti arcirādi āśrayaṇam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1455: atra ucyate - bhavet etadevaṃ yadi atyantabhinnā eva etāḥ sṛtayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1456: eka eva tu eṣā sṛtiḥanekaviśeṣaṇā brahmalokaprapadanī kvacit kenacit viśeṣaṇena upalakṣita iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1458: prakaraṇabhede api hi vidyā ekatve bhavati itaretara viśeṣaṇa upasaṃhāravat gativiśeṣaṇānām api upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1459: vidyābhede api tu gati ekadeśapratyabhijñānāt gantavya abhedāt ca gati abheda eva /
GSP33brssgo4u:1460: tathā hi 'te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssgo4u:1462: 'sā yā brahmaṇo jitiryā vyuṣṭistāṃ jitiṃ jayati tāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ vyaśnute' (kauṣī. 1.4)
GSP33brssgo4u:1464: iti ca tatra tatra tat eva ekaṃ phalaṃ brahmalokaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ pradarśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1465: yat tu etaiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam arcirādi āśrayaṇe na syāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1468: na hi eka eva śabdo raśmīn ca prāpayitum arhati arcirādīn ca vyāvartayitum /
GSP33brssgo4u:1469: tasmāt raśmisaṃbandha eva ayamavadhāryata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1470: tvarāvacanaṃ tu arcirādi apekṣāyām api gantavyāntarāpekṣā śaighryārthatvāt na uparudhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1473: iti mārgadvayabhraṣṭānāṃ kaṣṭaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sthānam ācakṣāṇā pitṛyāṇavyatiriktam ekameva devayānam arcirādiparvāṇaṃ panthānaṃ prathayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1474: bhūyāṃsi arcirādisṛtau mārgaparvāṇi alpīyāṃsi tu anyatra /
GSP33brssgo4u:1475: bhūyasāṃ ca anuguṇyena alpīyasāṃ nayanaṃ nyāyyam iti ataḥ api arcirādinā tat prathiteḥ iti uktam // 1 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1476: evamutkrāntiṃ nirūpya tatsādhyaṃ mārgaṃ gantavyaṃ ca nirūpayituṃ pādamārabhate-arcirādinā tatprathiteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1480: pūrvaṃ yadākadācinmṛtasyāpi phalaprāptiruktā tadvadyena kenacinmārgeṇa gatiriti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ vikalpaḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1484: kiñca mārgabhede satyasmādayaṃ mārgastvarayā prāpaka iti yuktaṃ na mārgaikya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1491: parāvato dīrghāyuṣo hiraṇyagarbhasya parā dīrghāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarānvasanti kāryabrahmaṇo yā jitiḥ sarvatra jayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1495: yathā laukikamārge vilambastathā arcirādau neti tvarāvacanopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1504: kena punaḥ saṃniveśaviśeṣeṇa gativiśeṣāṇānām itaretara viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti tat etat suhṛt bhūtvā ācāryo grathayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1505: 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa indralokaṃ sa prajāpatilokaṃ sa brahmalokam'(kau. 1.3)
GSP33brssgo4u:1507: tatra arciḥ agnilokaśabdau tāvat ekārthau jvalanavacanatvāt iti na atra saṃniveśakramaḥ kvacit anveṣyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1508: vāyuḥ tu arcirādau vartmani na śrutaḥ katam asmin sthāne niveśayitavya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1510: iti atra saṃvatsarāt parāñcam ādityāt arvāñcaṃ vāyum abhisaṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1514: iti atrāviśeṣa upadiṣṭasya vāyoḥ śrutyantare viśeṣa upadośo dṛśyate 'yadā vai puruṣo
GSP33brssgo4u:1515: 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1516: tena sa ūrdhvamākramate sa ādityamāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.101) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1517: etasmāt ādityāt vāyoḥ pūrvatvadarśanāt viśeṣāt abda ādityayoḥ antarāle vāyuḥ niveśayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1518: kasmāt punaḥ agneḥ paratvadarśanāt viśeṣāt arciṣaḥ anantaraṃ vāyuḥ na niveśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1519: na eṣaḥ asti viśeṣa iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1520: nanu udāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa varuṇalokam' (kauṣī. 1.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1521: ucyate - kevala- atra pāṭhaḥ paurvāparyeṇāvasthito na atra kramavacanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1523: padārtha upadarśanamātraṃ hi atra kriyate etam etaṃ ca āgacchati iti itaratra punaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1524: vāyuprattena rathacakramātreṇa cchidreṇa ūrdhvam ākramya ādityam āgacchati iti avagamyate kramaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1528: tatra ādityān antaryāya devalokāt vāyum abhisaṃbhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1529: vāyum abdāt iti tu chandogaśruti apekṣayā uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1530: chāndogya vājasaneyakayoḥ tu ekatra devaloko na vidyate paratra saṃvatsaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1531: tatra śrutidvayapratyayāt ubhau api ubhayatra grathayitavyau /
GSP33brssgo4u:1532: tatra api māsasaṃbandhāt saṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devaloka iti vivektavyam // 2 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1534: arcirādiṣvasmādayamanantara iti krameṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva ucyata ityadhikaraṇasya tātparyamuktvā viṣayamāha-sa etamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1536: sa kiṃ arcirātmakāgneranantaramuta saṃvatsarātpara iti pāṭhādvakṣyamāṇaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye siddhāntamevopakramate-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1537: puruṣaḥ upāsako 'smāllokāddehātpraiti nirgacchati tasmai prāptāya puruṣāya sa vāyustatra svātmani vijihīte chidraṃ karoti,
GSP33brssgo4u:1538: tena vāyudattena rathacakrachidratulyena dvāreṇordhvamādityaṃ gacchatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1543: kāṇvānāṃ tu tenetyūrdhvamiti ca śabdābhyāṃ kramaniścayātpāṭhabādha iti siddhāntārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1545: vājiśrutisthe tu saṃvatsarasyāśruteḥ kathamabdātparo vāyurityata āha-vājeti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1546: tarhi devalokādvāyumiti sūtraṃ syādityata āha-vāyumabdāditi tviti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1547: saṃvatsarasya māsāvayavitvānmāsānantaryaṃ saṃvatsarātparo devalokastataḥ paro vāyurvāyoḥ para āditya iti śrutidvaye kramo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1555: iti asyā vidyuta upariṣṭāt sa varuṇalokam iti ayaṃ varuṇaḥ saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1557: yadā hi viśāla avidyutaḥ tīvraḥ tanitaniḥ ghoṣā jīmūta udareṣu pranṛtyanti āthāpaḥ prapatanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1560: apāṃ ca adhipatiḥ varuṇa iti śrutismṛtiprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1561: varuṇāt adhīndraprajāpatī sthānāntara abhāvāt pāṭhasāmarthyāt ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:1562: ānantukatvāt api varuṇādīnām anta eva niveśo vaiśeṣikasthānābhāvāt vidyut ca antya arcirādau vartmani // 3 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1563: evaṃ kauṣītakibhiragnyanantaraṃ paṭhitasya vāyoḥ sthānamuktvā vāyvanantaraṃ paṭhitasya varuṇasyārcirādimārge sthānamāha-taḍito 'dhi varuṇaḥ saṃbandhāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1564: paṭhito varuṇādirmārgaparvatvena saṃbadhyate na veti saṃdehe 'rciṣo 'harityādi pañcamyārcirādīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1568: varuṇasyābdvārā vidyusaṃbandhāt 'āgantukānāmante niveśaḥ'iti nyāyāycca vidyudānantarye sati yathāpāṭhamindraprajāpatyoḥ krama ityarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo4u:1573: teṣu eva arcirādiṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim etāni mārgacihnāni uta bhogabhūmayaḥ athavā netāro gantṛṇām iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1574: tatra mārgalakṣaṇabhūtā arcirādaya iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1576: yathā hi loke kaścit grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā pratiṣṭhāsamānaḥ anuśiṣyate gacchetaḥ tvam
GSP33brssgo4u:1577: amuṃ giriṃ tato nyagrodhaṃ tato nadīṃ tato grāmaṃ tato nagaraṃ vā prāpsyasi iti evam
GSP33brssgo4u:1578: iha api arciṣo aharahna āpūryamāṇapakṣim ityādi āha /
