GSP33brssgo4u:1581: lokaśabdaḥ ca prāṇināṃ bhogāyataneṣu bhāṣyate - 'manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devalokaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.16) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:1582: tathā ca brāhmaṇam - 'ahorātreṣu te lokeṣu sajjante' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo4u:1585: cetanā hi loke rājaniyuktāḥ puruṣā durgeṣu mārgeṣu ativāhyān ativāhayanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1586: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātivāhikā eva ete bhavitum arhanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1588: tathā hi 'candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etānbrahma gamayati' (chā. 4.15.5)
GSP33brssgo4u:1590: tat vacanaṃ tat viṣayam eva upakṣīṇam iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1592: yadi arcirādiṣu puruṣā gamayitāraḥ prāptāḥ te ca mānavāḥ tato yuktaṃ tat nivṛttyarthaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇam amānava iti // 4 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1596: arcirādayo vidyudantāścetanā netāraścāmānavapurūṣeṇa netrā saha paṭhitatvāditi siddhāntayati-evamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1599: eva mānavāḥ prakṛtāḥ prakaraṇabalādvidyudanantaraṃ mānavasya netuḥ prāptau prakaraṇaprāptanetṛtvānuvādenāmānavatvamekameva
GSP33brssgo4u:1601: netṛprakaraṇānaṅgīkāre tvamānavaḥ puruṣo gamayatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta amānavatvavannetṛtvasyāpyaprāpteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1608: ye tāvat arcirādimārgāḥ te dehaviyogāt saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇagrāmā iti asvatantrā arcirādīnām
GSP33brssgo4u:1609: api acetanatvāt asvātantryam iti ataḥ arcirādi abhimāninaḥ cetanā devatāviśeṣā atiyātrāyāṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1611: loke api hi matta mūrcchitādayaḥ saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇāḥ paraprayuktavartmāno bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1612: anavasthitatvāt api arcirādīnāṃ na mārgalakṣaṇatva upapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1613: na hi rātrau pretasya ahaḥsvarūpa abhisaṃbhava upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1614: na ca pratipālanamasti iti uktaṃ purastāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1615: dhruvatvāt tu devatā ātmānāṃ na ayaṃ doṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1616: arcirādi śabdatā ca eṣām arcirādi abhimānāt upapadyate 'arciṣo 'haḥ'(chā. 4.15.5, 5,10.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:1617: ityādinirdeśaḥ tu ativāhikatve api na virudhyate arciṣā hetunā ahaḥ abhisaṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1619: tathā ca loke prasiddheṣu api ativāhikeṣu evañjātīyaka upadeśo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1620: gaccha tvam ito balavarmāṇaṃ tato jayasiṃhaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇaguptam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1624: iti saṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ ativāhi ativāhakatva lakṣaṇa uktaḥ tena sa eva upakrame api iti nirdhāryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1625: saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇatvāt eva ca gantṛṣu na tatra upabhogasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1626: lokaśabdaḥ tu anupabhuñjāneṣu api gantṛṣu gamayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1628: ataḥ agnisvāmikaṃ lokaṃ prāptaḥ agninā ativāhyate vāyusvāmikaṃ prāpto vāyunā iti yojayitavyam // 5 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1633: arciraharādīnāmasthiratvādrātryādau mṛtasya pratīkṣā nāstītyuktatvācca na mārgacihnatvaṃ bhogyatvaṃ vā,
GSP33brssgo4u:1643: vidyuto hi adhi varuṇādaya upakṣiptā vidyutaḥ tu anantaramā brahmaprāpteḥ amānavasya eva puruṣasya gamayitṛtvaṃ śrutam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1646: tato vidyut abhisaṃbhavanāt ūrdhvaṃ vidyut anantaravartina eva amānavena puruṣeṇa varuṇalokādiṣu ativāhyamānā brahmalokaṃ gacchanti iti avagantavyam
GSP33brssgo4u:1647: 'tānvaidyutātpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etya brahmalokaṃ gamayati' iti tasya eva gamayitṛtvaśruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1648: varuṇādayaḥ tu tasya eva apratibandhakaraṇena sāhāyya anuṣṭhānena vā kenacit anugrāhakā iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1649: tasmāt sādhu uktam ativāhikā devatātmānaḥ arcirādaya iti // 6 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1652: śrutyā varuṇādīnāṃ netṛtvābhāve 'pyanugrāhakatvena mārgāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo4u:1658: iti atra vicikitsyate - kiṃ kāryam aparaṃ brahma gamayati āhosvit param eva avikṛtaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1661: tatra kāryameva saguṇam aparaṃ brahma enān gamayati amānavaḥ puruṣa iti bādariḥ ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1664: asya hi kāryabrahmaṇo gantavyatvam upapadyate pradeśavattvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1665: na tu parasmin brahmaṇi gantṛtvaṃ gantavyatvaṃ gatiḥ vā avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1667: evaṃ mārgaṃ nirūpya gantavyaṃ cintayati-kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1668: paraṃ brahma gantavyamiti pūrvapakṣe mārgasya muktyarthatā kāryaṃ brahmeti siddhānte bhogārthateti matvā prathamaṃ siddhāntamāha-tatra kāryameveti
GSP33brssgo4u:1675: brahmalokāngamayati te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssgo4u:1676: iti ca śrutyantare viśeṣitatvāt kāryabrahmaviṣaya eva gatiḥ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1677: nahi bahuvacanena viśeṣaṇaṃ parasmin brahmaṇi avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1678: kārye tu avasthābheda upapatteḥ saṃbhavati bahuvacanam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1679: lokaśrutiḥ api vikāragocarāyāma eva saṃniveśaviśiṣṭāyāṃ bhogabhūmāvau āñjasī /
GSP33brssgo4u:1680: gauṇī tu anyatra 'brahmaiva loka eṣa samrāṭ' ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:1681: adhikaraṇa adhikartavyanirdeśaḥ api parasmin brahmaṇi anāñjasaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1690: nanu kāryaviṣaye api brahmaśabdo na upapadyate samanvaye hi samastasya jagato janmādikāraṇaṃ sthāpitam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1694: parabrahmasāmīpyāt aparasya brahmaṇaḥ tasmin api brahmaśabdaprayogo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1695: param eva hi brahma viśuddha upādhisaṃbandhaṃ kvacit kaiścit vikāradharmaiḥ manomayatvādibhiḥ upāsanāya upadiśyamānam aparam iti sthitiḥ //
GSP33brssgo4u:1697: na hi parasmāt brahmaṇaḥ anyatra kvacit nityatāṃ saṃbhāvayanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1698: darśayati ca devayānena pathā prasthitānām anāvṛttim /
GSP33brssgo4u:1700: iti teṣām iha na punarāvṛttiḥ asti 'tayordhvamāyannamṛtatvameti' (chā. 8.6.6), ka. 6.16) iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:1702: kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ param abhidhānāt / BBs_4,3.10 /
GSP33brssgo4u:1703: kāryabrahmalokapralayapratyupasthāne sati tatra eva utpannasamyagdarśanāḥ santaḥ tat adhyakṣeṇa hiraṇyagarbheṇa sahātaḥ paraṃ pariśuddhaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1705: na hi āñjasa eva gatipūrvikā paraprāptiḥ saṃbhavati iti upapaditam // 10 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1707: smṛtiḥ api etam artham anujānāti - 'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33brssgo4u:1709: tasmāt kāryabrahmaviṣayā gatiḥ śrūyata iti siddhāntaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1710: kaṃ puna- pūrvapakṣam āśaṅkya ayaṃ siddhāntaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ 'kāryaṃ bādariḥ' (bra.sū. 4.3.7)
GSP33brssgo4u:1715: iti atra parameva brahma prāpayati iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1717: paraṃ hi brahma brahmaśabdasya mukhyam ālambanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1722: kutātmānaḥ śuddhadhiyastatrotpannasamyagdhiyaḥ sarve brahmaṇā mucyamānena saha paraṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1724: evaṃ siddhāntamuktvā tena nirastaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-kaṃ punarityādinā // 9 // // 10 // // 11 // //12//
GSP33brssgo4u:1730: amṛtatvaṃ ca parasmin brahmaṇi upapadyate na kārye,
GSP33brssgo4u:1734: paraviṣaya eva ca eṣā gatiḥ kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1735: na hi tatra vidyāntaraprakramaḥ asti 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' (ka. 2.14)
GSP33brssgo4u:1737: daharavidyāyāṃ kaṭhavallīṣu parabrahmaprakaraṇe ca tayordhvamāyanniti gatirdarśitā //13//
GSP33brssgo4u:1742: iti na ayaṃ kāryaviṣayaḥ pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ 'nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:1743: iti kāryavilakṣaṇasya parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1748: iti ca parasya eva brahmaṇo yaśonāmatva prasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1749: 'sā ceyaṃ veśmapratipattirgatipūrvikā hārdavidyāyāmuditā tadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam' (chā. 8.5.3) iti atra /
GSP33brssgo4u:1750: paderapi ca gatyarthatvāt mārga apekṣā avasīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1752: tau etau dvau pakṣau ācāryeṇa sūtritau gati upapattyādibhiḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1754: tatra gati upapattyādayaḥ prabhavanti mukhyatvādīna ābhāsayituṃ na tu mukhyatvādayo gati upapattyādīn ityādya eva siddhānto vyākhyāto dvitīyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1755: na hi asati api saṃbhave mukhyasya eva arthasya grahaṇam iti kaścit ājñāpayitā vidyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1756: paravidyāprakaraṇe api ca tat stutyarthaṃ vidyāntara āśrayagati anukīrtanam upapadyate 'viṣvaṅṅanyā utkramaṇe bhavanti' (chā. 8.6.6) itivat
GSP33brssgo4u:1758: iti tu pūrvavākyavicchedena kārye api pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1759: saguṇe api ca brahmaṇi sarvātmatva saṃkīrtanaṃ sarvakarmā sarvakāma ityādivat avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1761: kecit punaḥ pūrvāṇi pūrvapakṣasūtrāṇi bhavanti uttarāṇi siddhāntasūtrāṇi iti etāṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1762: vyavasthānam anurudhyamānāḥ paraviṣayā eva gatiśrutīḥ pratiṣṭhāpayanti tat anupapannaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1764: yat sarvagataṃ sarvāntaraṃ sarvātmakaṃ ca paraṃ brahma 'ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ' 'yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:1768: ityādi śrutinirdhārita viśeṣaṃ tasya gantavyatā na kadācit api upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1770: anyo hi anyat gacchati iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssgo4u:1771: nanu loke gatasya api gantavyatā deśāntaraviśiṣṭā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1772: yathā pṛthivīstha eva pṛthivīṃ deśāntaradvāreṇa gacchati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1773: tathā ananyatve api sarvaśakti upetatvāt kathañcit gantavyatā syāt iti / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1780: ityādi śruti smṛti nyāyebhyo na deśakālādi viśeṣayogaḥ paramātmani kalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1781: yena bhūpradeśa vayovasthā nyāyena asya gantavyatā syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1782: bhūvayasoḥ tu pradeśa avasthādi viśeṣayogāt upapadyate deśa kāla viśiṣṭā gantavyatā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1783: jagat utpatti sthiti pralayahetutva śruteḥ anekaśaktitvaṃ brahmaṇa iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1785: utpattyādiśrutīnām api samānam ananyārthatvam iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1787: mṛdādi dṛṣṭāntaiḥ hi sato brahmaṇa ekasya satyatvaṃ vikārasya ca āvṛtatvaṃ pratipādayat śāstraṃ na utpattyādiparaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1788: kasmāt punaḥ utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ na punaḥ itara śeṣatvam itarāsām iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1790: na hi ātmana ekatva nityatva śuddhatvādi avagatau satyāṃ bhūyaḥ kācit ākāṅkṣā upajāyate puruṣārthasamāptibuddhi upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1794: etaṃ ha vāva na tapati kimahaṃ sādhu nākaravaṃ kimahaṃ pāpamakaravam' (taitti. 2.9.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:1796: tathā eva ca viduṣāṃ tuṣṭi anubhavādi darśanāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1797: vikāra anṛta abhisaṃdhi apavādāt ca 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1798: ato na viśeṣanirākaraṇa śrutīnām anyaśeṣatvam avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1799: na evam utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ nirākāṅkṣārtha pratipādanasāmarthyam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1801: tathā hi 'tatraitacchruṅgamutpatitaṃ somya vijānīhi nedamamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati' (chā. 6.8.3)
GSP33brssgo4u:1802: iti upanyasya udarke sata eva ekasya jagat mūlasya vijñeyatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1807: evam utpattyādiśrutīnām aikātmya avagamaparatvāt na anekaśaktiyogo brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1810: iti ca parasmin brahmaṇi gatiṃ nivārayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1812: gatikalpanāyāṃ ca gantā jīvo gantavyasya brahmaṇaḥ avayavo vikāro vā tataḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1816: yadi ekadeśaḥ tena ekadeśino nityaprāptatvāt na punaḥ brahmagamanam upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1817: ekadeśitva kalpanā ca brahmaṇi anupapannā niravayavatva prasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1818: vikārapakṣe api etat atulyaṃ vikāreṇa api vikāriṇo nityaprāptatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1819: na hi ghaṭo mṛdātmatāṃ parityajya avatiṣṭhate parityāge vā abhāvaprāpteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1820: vikāra avayavapakṣayoḥ ca tadvataḥ sthiratvāt brahmaṇaḥ saṃsāragamanam api anavakḷptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1822: saḥ aṇuḥ vyāpī madyama parimāṇo vā bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1826: pratiṣiddhe ca aṇutva madhyama parimāṇatve vistareṇa purastāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1829: vikāra avayavapakṣayoḥ api samānaḥ ayaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1830: vikāra avayavayoḥ tadvatoḥ ananyatvāt adoṣa iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo4u:1836: yat tu kaiścit jalpyate nityāni naimittikāni karmāṇi anuṣṭhīyante pratyavāya anutpattaye
GSP33brssgo4u:1837: kāmyāni pratiṣiddhāni ca parihriyante svarganarakān avāptaye sāṃpratadeha upabhogyāni
GSP33brssgo4u:1838: ca karmāṇi upabhogena eva kṣapyanta ityato vartamānadehapātāt ūrdhvaṃ dehāntara pratisaṃdhāna
GSP33brssgo4u:1839: kāraṇa abhāvāt svarūpa avasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kaivalyaṃ vinā api brahmātmataya evaṃvṛttasya setsyati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1842: na hi etat śāstreṇa kenacit pratipāditaṃ mokṣārthi itthaṃ samācaret iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1843: svamanīṣayā tu etat tarkitaṃ yasmāt karmanimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasmāt nimitta abhāvāt na bhaviṣyati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1844: na ca etat tarkayitum api śakyate nimitta abhāvasya durjñānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1845: bahūni hi karmāṇi jātyantarasaṃcitāni iṣṭa aniṣṭavipākāni ekaikasya jantoḥ saṃbhāvyante /
GSP33brssgo4u:1846: teṣāṃ viruddha phalānāṃ yugapat upabhoga asaṃbhavāt kānicit labdha avasarāṇi idaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1847: janma nirmimate kānicit tu deśakālanimittapratīkṣāṇi asata iti ataḥ teṣām avaśiṣṭānāṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1848: sāṃpratena upabhogena kṣapaṇāsaṃbhavāt na yathāvarṇitacaritasya api vartamānadehapāte
GSP33brssgo4u:1850: karmaśeṣasadbāvasiddhaḥ ca 'tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇāstataḥ śeṣeṇa' ityādi śruti smṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1852: nitya naimittikāni teṣāṃ kṣepakāṇi bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1856: na ca janmāntara saṃcitānāṃ sukṛtānāṃ nitya naimittikaiḥ asti virodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1858: duritānāṃ tu aśuddhirūpatvāt sati virodhe bhavatu kṣapaṇaṃ na tu tāvatā dehāntara nimitta abhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1861: na ca nitya naimittikānuṣṭhānāt pratyavāya anutpattimātraṃ na punaḥ phalāntara utpattiḥ iti pramāṇam asti phalāntarasya api anuniṣpādinaḥ saṃbhavāt
GSP33brssgo4u:1862: smarati hi āpastambaḥ - 'tadyathāmre phalārte nimitte chāyāgandhāvanūtpadyete evaṃ dharmaṃ caryamāṇārthā anūtpadyante' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1863: na ca asati samyak darśane sarvātmanā kāmyapratiṣiddhavarjanaṃ janmaprāyaṇāntarālaṃ kenacit pratijñātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1865: saṃśayitavyaṃ tu bhavati tathā api nimitta abhāvasya durjñānatvameva /
GSP33brssgo4u:1866: na ca anabhyupagamyamāne jñānagamye brahmātmatve kartṛtva bhoktṛtva svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ kaivalyam ākāṅkṣituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1869: kartṛtva bhoktṛtva kāryam anartho na tat śaktiḥ tena śakti avasthāne 'pi kāryaparihārat upapanno mokṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1872: atha api syāt na kevalā śaktiḥ kāryam ārabhate anapekṣya anyāni nimittāni /
GSP33brssgo4u:1873: ata ekākinī sā sthitāpi na aparādhyati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1876: tasmāt kartṛtva bhoktṛtva svabhāve satyām anyasatyāṃ vidyāgamyāyāṃ brahmātmatāyāṃ na kathañcana mokṣaṃ pratyāśā asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1879: parasmāt ananyatve api jīvasya sarvavyavahāra lopaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1880: pratyakṣādi pramāṇa apravṛtteḥ iti cet / na /

GSP33brssgo4u:2194: satyakāmatvādayaḥ tu yadi api vastusvarūpeṇa eva dharmā ucyante satyāḥ kāmā asya iti /

GSP33brssgo4u:2228: hārdavidyāyāṃ śrūyate - 'sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti' (chā. 8.2.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2229: tatra saṃśayaḥ kiṃ saṃkalpa eva kevalaḥ pitrādisamutthāne hetuḥ uta nimittāntara sahita iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2230: tatra sati api saṃkalpādeva iti śravaṇe lokavat nimittāntara apekṣatā yuktā /
GSP33brssgo4u:2231: yathā loke asmadādīnāṃ saṃkalpāt gamanādibhyaḥ ca hetubhyaḥ pitrādi saṃpattiḥ bhavati evaṃ muktasya api syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2233: saṃkalpādeva iti tu rājña iva saṃkalpitārthasiddhikarīṃ sādhanāntarasāmagrīṃ sulabhām apekṣya ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2234: na ca saṃkalpamātrasam utthānāḥ pitrādayo manorathāvijṛmbhitavat calatvāt puṣkalaṃ bhogaṃ samarpayituṃ paryāptāḥ syuḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2235: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ saṃkalpādeva tu kevalāt pitrādisamutthānam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2238: ityādikā hi śrutiḥ nimittāntara apekṣāyāṃ pīḍyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:2239: nimittāntaram api tu yadi saṃkalpa anuvidhāyi eva syāt bhavatu na tu prayatnāntarasaṃpādyaṃ nimittāntaram iti iṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2241: na ca śruti avagamye arthe lokavat iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ kramate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2242: saṃkalpabalāt eva ca eṣāṃ yāvat prayojanaṃ sthairya upapattiḥ. prākṛtasaṃkalpavilakṣaṇatvāt muktasaṃkalpasya // 8 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2247: na caivakāravirodhaḥ saṃkalpena sāmagryā ayogavyavacchedena saulabhyārthatvāt,
GSP33brssgo4u:2250: siddhānte tu vidyābalena saṃkalpasyaiva bhogapuṣṭikaratvasiddhiriti bedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2251: kiñca yadi bhogasaṃkalpānantaramapi yatnāntarasādhyanimittāpekṣā syāttarhi nimittaprāpteḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2252: prāgjātasaṃkalpasya vandhyatvaṃ syādbhoge vilambāttataḥ satyasaṃkalpaśruterna yatnāntarāpekṣetyāha-nimittāntaramapi tviti //8 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2256: ata eva ca avandhyasaṃkalpatvāt ananya adhipatiḥ vidvān bhavati na asya anyaḥ adhipatiḥ bhavati ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo4u:2267: śarīra indriyāṇi punaḥ prāpta aiśvaryasya viduṣaḥ santi na vā santi iti samīkṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2268: tatra bādariḥ tāvat ācāryaḥ śarīrasya indriyāṇāṃ ca abhāvaṃ mahīyamānasya viduṣo manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2274: jaiminiḥ tu ācāryo manovat śarīrasya api sendriyasya bhāvaṃ muktaṃ prati manyate /

GSP33brssgo4u:2279: vidyamānameva idaṃ saguṇāvasthāyām aiśvaryaṃ bhūmavidyā stutaye saṃkīrtyata iti ataḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2281: evakāravanmanaseti viśeṣaṇenānyayogavyavacchedāddehādyabhāva iti pūrvapakṣayati-abhāvaṃ bādarirāha hyevam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2283: tatra dehādayo na santyeva sadā santyeveti ca pakṣadvayaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ /

GSP33brssgo4u:2291: bādarāyaṇaḥ punaḥ ācāryaḥ ata eva ubhayaliṅgaśrutidarśanāt ubhayavidhatvaṃ sādhu manyate yadā saśarīratāṃ saṃkalpayati tadā saśarīro bhavati yadā tu aśarīratāṃ tadā aśarīra iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2295: yathā dvādaśa ahaḥsatram ahīnaḥ ca bhavati /

GSP33brssgo4u:2298: yadā tanoḥ sendriyasya śarīrasya abhāvaḥ tadā yathā saṃdhye sthāne śarīra indriyaviṣayeṣu
GSP33brssgo4u:2299: avidyamāneṣu api upalabdhimātrā eva pitrādikāmā bhavati evaṃ mokṣe api syuḥ evaṃ

GSP33brssgo4u:2313: tatra tridhābhāvādiṣu anekaśarīrasarge kiṃ nirātmakāni śarīrāṇi dāruyantrāṇi iva sṛjyante kiṃ vā sātmakāni asmadādi śarīravat iti bhavati vīkṣā
GSP33brssgo4u:2314: tatra ca ātma manasoḥ bheda anupapatteḥ ekena śarīreṇa yogāt itarāṇi śarīrāṇi nirātmakāni iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2315: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - pradīpavat āveśa iti /

GSP33brssgo4u:2317: evam ekaḥ api san vidvāna aiśvaryayogāt anekabhāvam āpadya sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi āviśati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2318: kutaḥ, tathā hi darśayati śāstram ekasya anekabhāvam - 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhā' (chā. 7.26.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2319: na etat dāruyantra upamā abhyupagame avakalpate na api jīvāntarāveśe /

GSP33brssgo4u:2323: ekamanonuvartini samanaskāni eva aparāṇi śarīrāṇi satyasaṃkalpatvāt srakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2324: sṛṣṭeṣu ca teṣu upādhibhedāt ātmanaḥ api bhedena adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ yokṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2325: eṣa eva ca yogaśāstreṣu yoginām anekaśarīraprayogakriyā // 15 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2330: sa ekadhā tridhā pañcadhetyādiśrutyā viduṣa evānekadhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2335: yadyapi mūlapradīpasya vartyantareṣūtpannadīpānāṃ cātyantabhedo 'sti liṅgasya tu dehabhedakṛto bhedo na svataḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:2338: tathāpi pradīpatvajātyaikyena vyaktiṣvaikyāropāt dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ sāmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2339: tathāca yathā pradīpo 'naikavartiṣu praviśati evaṃ vidyāyogabalādvidvaliṅgasya vyāpitvādanekadeheṣu yugapadāveśa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2342: yadanādi mana ekadehasthaṃ tadanusārīṇi dehāntarasthāpi manāṃsi bhavanti tadavasthānāṃ tanniyamyatvasaṃbhavāditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2344: nirmāṇacittānyasmitāmātrātpravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittamekamanekeṣāmiti hi bhagavatpatañjalinā sūtritam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2349: kathaṃ punaḥ muktasya anekaśarīra āveśādilakṣaṇam aiśvaryam abhyupagamyate yāvatā 'tatkena kaṃ vijānīyāt' (bṛ. 4.5.15)
GSP33brssgo4u:2352: iti ca evañjātīyakā śrutiḥ viśeṣavijñānaṃ vārayati ityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -

GSP33brssgo4u:2357: tayoḥ anyatarām avasthām apekṣya etat viśeṣasaṃjñābhāva vacanam /

GSP33brssgo4u:2361: 'yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 4.3.19, māṇḍū. 5)
GSP33brssgo4u:2363: saguṇavidyāvipāka avasthānaṃ tu etat svargādivat avasthāntaraṃ yatra etat aiśvaryam upavarṇyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2368: na tu taddvitīyamastīti kvacitsuṣuptimadhikṛtyoktaṃ 'tatkena kam'ityādi kvacinmuktiṃ prakṛtyoktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2369: evaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvavacanaṃ suṣuptimuktyanyatarāpekṣaṃ saguṇopāsakasya bhogoktau na virudhyate bhinnaviṣayatvādityāha-svāpyayeti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2372: atra samutthānādivākyaṃ muktiviṣayaṃ yatra suptā iti suptiviṣayamiti vibhāgaḥ //16//
GSP33brssgo4u:2377: ye saguṇabrahma upāsanāt saha eva manasā īśvarasāyujyaṃ vrajanti kiṃ teṣāṃ niravagraham aiśvaryaṃ bhavati āhosvit sāvagraham iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2379: niraṅ kuśameva eṣām aiśvaryaṃ bhavitum arhati 'āpnoti svārājyam' (tai. 1.6.2)
GSP33brssgo4u:2383: evaṃ prāpte paṭhati - jagat vyāpāravarjam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2384: jagat utpattyādi vyāpāraṃ varjayitvā anyat aṇimādi ātmakam aiśvaryaṃ muktānāṃ bhavitum arhati jagat vyāpāraḥ tu nityasiddhasya eva īśvarasya
GSP33brssgo4u:2385: kutaḥ - tasya tatra prakṛtatvāt asaṃnihitatvāt ca itareṣām /
GSP33brssgo4u:2386: para eva hi īśvaro jagat vyāpāre adhikṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2389: tat anveṣaṇavijijñāsanapūrvakaṃ tu itareṣām aṇimādi aiśvaryaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2391: samanaskatvāt eva ca eteṣām anaikamatye kasyacit sthiti abhiprāyaḥ kasyacit saṃhāra abhiprāya iti evaṃ virodhaḥ api kadācit syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2392: atha kasyacit saṃkalpam anvayasya saṃkalpa iti avirodhaḥ samarthyeta tataḥ parameśvara ākūtatantratvam eva itareṣām iti vyavatiṣṭhate // 17
GSP33brssgo4u:2397: siddhānte tu vidyāyogināmīśvaraniyamyatvādekasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasyaiva jagatkartṛtvasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2398: pralayātsargasamaye yasyekṣaṇapūrvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ śrutau prakṛtaṃ tasyaiva niyantṛtvādirjagadvyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2403: ekaṃ pratyanyeṣāṃ guṇatve tveka eveśvara ityāha-samanaskatvāditi //17//
GSP33brssgo4u:2408: ityādi pratyakṣa upadeśāt niravagraham aiśvaryaṃ viduṣāṃ nyāyyam iti tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2412: ādhikāriko yaḥ savitṛmaṇḍalādiṣu viśeṣa āyataneṣu avasthitaḥ para īśvaraḥ tadāyatta eva iyaṃ svārājyaprāptiḥ ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2414: yo hi sarvamanasāṃ patiḥ pūrvasiddha īśvaraḥ taṃ prāpnoti iti etat uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2415: tat anusāreṇa eva ca anantaram 'vākpatiścakṣuṣpatiḥ śrotrapatirvijñānapatiśca bhavati' (tai. 1.6.2) ityāha /
GSP33brssgo4u:2416: evam anyatra api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ nityasiddha īśvara āyattam eva itareṣām aiśvaryaṃ yojayitavyam // 18 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2419: manasaspatiḥ sūryamaṇḍalāntaḥsthaḥ paramātmā 'tat saviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2421: tathāca yadi pūrvaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ svārājyamuktaṃ syāttarhi īśvarasyāgre prāpyatāṃ na brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2422: ato bhoge svārājyaṃ na jagajjanmādiṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2427: vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha / BBs_4,4.19 /
GSP33brssgo4u:2428: vikārāvartyapi ca nityamuktaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpaṃ na kevalaṃ vikāramātragocaraṃ savitṛmaṇḍalādi adhiṣṭhānam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2429: tathā hi asya dvirūpāṃ sthitim āha āmnāyaḥ 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2433: na ca tat nirvikāraṃ rūpam itara ālambanāḥ prāpnuvanti iti śakyaṃ vaktum atatkratutvāt teṣām /
GSP33brssgo4u:2434: ataḥ ca yathā eva dvirūpe parameśvare nirguṇaṃ rūpam anavāpya saguṇa eva avatiṣṭhanta
GSP33brssgo4u:2435: evaṃ saguṇaḥ api niravagraham aiśvaryam anavāpya sāvagraha eva avatiṣṭhanta iti draṣṭavyam // 19 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2440: darśayataḥ ca vikāra āvartitvaṃ parasya jyotiṣaḥ śruti smṛtī /
GSP33brssgo4u:2441: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamagniḥ' (kaṭha. 5.15,
GSP33brssgo4u:2443: 'na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅ ko na pāvakaḥ' (gī. 15.6) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:2444: tat evaṃ vikāra āvartitvaṃ parasya jyotiṣaḥ prasiddham iti abhiprāyaḥ // 20 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2446: yathā jñānābhāvānnirguṇaṃ na prāptaṃ tathā dhyānābhāvājjagatsraṣṭṛtvādi na prāpyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2451: itaḥ ca na niraṅ kuśaṃ vikāra ālambanānām aiśvaryaṃ yasmāt bhogamātram eva eṣām anādisiddhena
GSP33brssgo4u:2452: īśvareṇa samānam iti śrūyate - 'tamāhāpo vai khalu mīyante loko 'sau' iti 'sa yathaitāṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:2453: devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavantyevaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti teno etasyai
GSP33brssgo4u:2456: tamupāsakaṃ brahmalokagatamāha-hiraṇyagarbhaḥ mayā khalvimā āpo amṛtarūpā mīyante bhujyante tavāpyasau loko 'mṛtodakalakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2464: nanu evaṃ sati sātiśayatvāt antavattvam aiśvaryasya syāt tataḥ ca eṣām āvṛttiḥ prasajyeta ityata uttaraṃ bhagavān bādarāyaṇa ācāryaḥ paṭhati
GSP33brssgo4u:2466: nāḍīraśmisamanvitena arcirādiparvaṇā devayānena pathā ye brahmalokaṃ śāstroktaviśeṣaṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:2467: gacchanti yasminnaraśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyāmito divi yasminnaśvatthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2468: somasavano yasminnaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇo yasmiṃśca prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśma
GSP33brssgo4u:2469: yaścānekadhā mantrārthavādādipradeśeṣu prapañcyate te taṃ prāpya na candralokādivabhuktabhogā āvartante /
GSP33brssgo4u:2476: antavattve api tu aiśvaryasya yathā anāvṛttiḥ tathā varṇitam 'kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥparam' (bra.sū. 4.3.10) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo4u:2477: samyak darśanavidhvasta tamasāṃ tu nityasiddhanirvāṇaparāyaṇānāṃ siddha eva anāvṛttiḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2478: tadāśrayaṇena eva hi nityasiddhanirvāṇaparāyaṇānāṃ siddhā eva anāvṛttiḥ tadāśrayaṇena
GSP33brssgo4u:2479: eva hi saguṇaśaraṇānām api anāvṛttisiddhiḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2480: anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt iti sūtra abhyāsaḥ śāstraparisamāptiṃ dyotayati // 22 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2484: bādarāyaṇapadena badarikāśramavāsoktyā nityasarvajñasya paramagurornārāyaṇasya prasādadyotanāttapraṇītaśāstre niravadyatāṃ dyotayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2485: saguṇavidyāyāḥ sātiśayaphalatve 'pi tato nirguṇavidyānāvṛttirityāha-anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2486: ye brahmalokaṃ gacchanti te taṃ prāpya nāvartante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2488: ito 'smātpṛthivīlokāttṛtīyasyāṃ divi yo brahmalokastasminnara iti ṇya iti cārṇakatulyau sudhāhṛdāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2492: yadyapi teṣāmiha na punarāvṛttirimaṃ mānavamiti ca śrutiṣvihemamiti viśeṣaṇādasminkalpe brahmalokaṃ gatānāṃ kalpāntare āvṛttirbhāti,
GSP33brssgo4u:2494: ye tu daharādīśvaropāstyā gatāsteṣāṃ saguṇavidyāphalakṣaye 'pi niravagraheśvarānugrahalabdhātmajñānānmuktiriti niyama ityabhipretyāha-antavattve 'pi tviti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2495: nanvatra sūtrakṛtā saguṇavidāmevānāvṛttikrama ukto na nirguṇavidāṃ tatra ko heturityāśaṅkya teṣāmāvṛttiśaṅkābhāvādityāha-samyagiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2498: ataḥ svata eva samyagdarśināmāvṛttiśaṅkā neti kimu vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2501: evaṃ samanvayoktyā brahmātmaikyasya vedāntapramāṇakatvamavadhārayituṃ vākyārthajñāne smṛtitarkādisarvaprakāravirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:2509: śārīkasya bhāṣyasya kṛtā vyākhyā satāṃ mude //1//
GSP33brssgo4u:2512: vakṣasyakṣṇośca pārśve karatalayugale kaustubhābhāṃ dayāṃ ca sītāṃ kodaṇḍadīkṣāmabhayavarayutāṃ vīkṣya rāmāṅgasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2513: svasyāḥ kva syāditīyaṃ hṛdi kṛtamananā bhāṣyaratnaprabhākhyā,
GSP33brssgo4u:2516: śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
